name: Sonic Mania Atmosphere
description: Welcome to Sonic Mania Atmosphere! A complete modpack of new, reimagined and returning zones along with a completely new soundtrack to create a fresh Mania experience unlike any before. The mods and music included are compliled from the best of the gamebanana modding community and Sonic Youtube community musicians to create a fluid and polished 2D Sonic experience from start to finish rivaling that of a sequel game.

name: SandStrike.io
description:
Are you ready for the ultimate adrenaline-fueled adventure in the desert? SandStrike is the game for you! This action-packed multiplayer shooting game is perfect for people who want to experience the excitement of high-speed battles and outmaneuvering their opponents.

With four different game modes to choose from, including classic team deathmatch and capture the flag, SandStrike offers endless possibilities for thrilling gameplay. And with a wide range of customizable weapons and equipment, you can tailor your loadout to suit your play style and dominate the competition.

name: Fantasy Jigsaw Puzzles: Dragons
description: Dragons, drakes, wyrms and wyverns. While the great beasts have passed into myth and legend, some doubt that they are fully extinct...

name: Fantasy Jigsaw Puzzles: Elves
description: From glittering white cities to hidden woodland outposts, the last remnants of elfkind are ever-vigilant against the growing darkness.

name: Clash: Robot Detective - Complete Edition
description: Crack the case with Clash!

name: Interstellar Pilot 2
description: The hit mobile game Interstellar Pilot 2 has come to Steam. Join the TEF forces heading to the Gatopean sector to find a new home for mankind. Play how you like in this open world space-sim developed by Pixelfactor.

name: Void: Edge of Existence
description: Take part in the Epic Adventure of Andral as he overcomes multiple Trials within the Edge of his own Existence to Reclaim his Soul.

name: Bosses
description: Let's boss battle!

name: Fantasy Jigsaw Puzzles: Dwarves
description: Tenacious and resourceful, the dwarves feel most at home in their cavernous mountain strongholds. Their ingenious machines are the envy of all who behold them.

name: Reach the Moon!
description: The game Reach the Moon! it is an experiment & casual game in same time. The main character is a bodybuilder which with the help of his enormous biceps throws a man into the air. His main goal is to make the man reach the galaxy. Will he be able to see the earth from above?

name: Fantasy Jigsaw Puzzles
description: A selection of fantasy jigsaw puzzles. Customize your puzzle experience and expand the game with DLC.

name: Easy Red 2: Stalingrad
description: The Volga River is not lost yet! Come on comrades! With Easy Red 2: Stalingrad you will expand the front to the East for the first time, in the heart of the Soviet Union.

name: Crypto Mining Simulator: Ultimate Trading Strategy Tycoon Craft & Idle Game 3D
description: Crypto Mining Simulator is a detailed game about actual cryptocurrency!

name: Clumsy Rush: Ultimate Guys - Definitive Edition
description: Clumsy Rush: Ultimate Guys Definitive Edition is a fun-centric party game which throws you (along with your friends) into a series of challenges and races throughout randomly generated tracks.

name: League of Enthusiastic Losers: Ultimate Edition
description:
This bundle includes the first Art Book for League of Enthusiastic Losers.

Vitya and Volodya - two best friends and heroes of our story - swim with a struggle in everyday life and try to stay afloat. Facing an eviction, they decide to find a treasure that will help with debt repayment.

name: Pixel Boy: Lost in the Castle
description: 2D puzzle game in pixel art graphics. Solve almost 100 levels. No time limit, no enemies. Just fun.

name: Pid: Deluxe Edition
description: Pid is a platforming puzzle game set in an unfamiliar land, full of unique enemies and unlikely allies. One of which is the force of gravity! Play alone or along with a friend.

name: Syndrome: Ultimate Edition
description: Along the base game, you also get acces to the Soundtrack DLC. In space, no one can hear you scream. Something from the abyss of space is kidnapping and killing the crew of the ship. And it doesn't stop hunting.

name: Tuk Tuk Extreme: Real Car Driving Simulator & Parking 2023 Car Games 3D Vehicle
description: Have you ever drive a Tuk Tuk at max speed through the mountains and dangerous parts of the road? If not, then enter the world of speed lovers, because the hottest curves are waiting for you.

name: The Preschoolers: Season 1 Ultimate Edition
description: Preschoolers is the first Nintendo Switch children cartoon mixed with a color book. Listen to a story of a noisy neighbor who gets a well deserved lesson in humility.

name: Vampire Slayer: The Resurrection
description: Vampire Slayer is a fast paced multiplayer team game featuring two completely different teams, Vampires and Slayers.

name: Blacksmith Forger
description: Blacksmith Forger, We are a forge, We can craft Gold ingots and Iron ingots as well as Weapons and Shields. Our customers order weapons and shields. You have to catch up with them! If they wait too long, they get bored.

name: Animal Golf: Battle Race
description: Cute animal golf battle race game!

name: Gravity Thrust
description: Fly many solomissions or fight against other players in multiplayer and relive the good old arcade times!

name: Shazabi and the Cantina Catacombs
description:
Enter the catacombs of the Cantina of Eight (that's the name of the community) and search for the Achtefakt!
While you're at it save the Cantina residents who have been kidnapped by the zoo (which doesn't actually exist).

name: Sandy at the Telephone Company
description: Sandy just got his first job at the telephone company... make sure he keeps it!!!!!

name: Lost Egg 3: The Final
description: The egg's great adventure, the final chapter. That fragile but brave egg has returned with even more new powers, but this time its adventure is over. A hard action adventure game about the fragility, bravery, and sometimes friendship of raw eggs. Aim for the frying pan at the end of rolling through various stages with sad and touching melody.

name: Mini Star Bakery
description: Mini Star Bakery is a relaxing game that expands the store by making and selling bread.

name: Volunteer
description: Experience first-person horror and fight to survive in a chaotic landscape infested with bloodthirsty creatures.

name: Revenge on the Streets 3
description: In this new and last continuation, the wife of the former crime boss assumes her role as boss and puts an end to the life of the game's protagonist's brother, helps Karina and her family get the last fight in "Revenge On The Streets"

name: Creatures of Energy
description:
In this game turn based game you grow your creatures to destroy the enemy ones.
The board is made out of angle pieces which can rotate. A group of connected pieces is a creature.

name: Sass vs. Fash: Girlballs of Steel
description: Sass VS Fash is a retro FPS throwback to the Wolfenstein series where the political and supernatural combine into a nazi-killing, action-filled romp in your mission to finally assassinate the Führer of Johannland, Johann W. Weiss.

name: Koodbool
description: Neo L.A.: the distant future of 2024. Retired for eons since a series of legal disputes, Duke Nukem is off to a literal fresh start, festively spending Christmas eve alone, homeless and panhandling.

name: Alboite
description:
Twitch game to play with your chat.
The streamer makes up a phrase and puts the words in a "box" without revealing them to viewers. Then viewers simply write words in the chat to gradually reveal the sentence and thus score points based on the number of words and the number of characters found. Score a max of points to win a game and climb the monthly ladder.

name: Bat Trip
description: Sin descripción

name: Rockman X: New Year 2023
description: A small hack to celebrate the Chinese New Year 2023, Year of the Rabbit.

name: The Game Maker
description:
The Game Maker is the 18th game in the Carol Reed series.

The game is 100% mouse driven and features a classic adventure game interface.
There is absolutely no need to have played any of the previous games in the Carol Reed series to fully enjoy The Game Maker.

The game takes place is Sweden, but it is in English. All dialogues have subtitles.
The game contains no graphic violence or any swearing. It has no action elements, and is suitable for ages 15 and up.

name: Draw Action: Freestyle Fight
description: Sin descripción

name: Repossessed
description: VR zombie shooter built for Oculus Quest 3 120HZ. Close quarters akimbo combat with the infected.

name: Omurice Next Time
description: Finn and Gray have been together for five years now. Two men, simple living, and their biggest hobby is just eating for fun. Explore their husband & husband life, joy and love, hopes and dreams, and casual awkwardness and embarrassment in this slice of life interactive storybook.

name: Another Reverie
description: A small game about moving on.

name: LZJ's Galaxy Trip
description: A romhack of Super Mario 64 about going to space. It is Liuzujin's third hack.

name: Hero's Fever Dream
description: HERO's Fever Dream is a mod that tackles the aftermath of the truth from OMORI.

name: Nothing Bad Ever Happens to Me
description:
Nothing Bad Ever Happens to me, is a short, 5 ~ 10min. story about a few girls who don't really get along.

Katrina, our heroine, is a popular girl who has had great luck in her life thus far. She's at the top of her class, her family is happy... she probably couldn't ask for a more perfect life!

One day, a few of her classmates suggest they walk home together. Might not be a bad idea to humor the lower-class.

What could go wrong?

name: Office Mayhem
description: A third person action game where you are sick and tired of working your BS job for your BS boss. You have officially lost your mind and are ready to cause absolute mayhem and chaos in your workplace. Turn ordinary office supplies into weapons of mass destruction and destroy your colleagues!

name: Mecha Blade
description: As Edgar Grey, chosen by the Angel Uriel to operate the Behemoth Mecha Suit to save the nuclear devastated world from the evil lord Zebul. Command you and your army to change the course of the world. What will you make of this new world in this intense Mecha SRPG?

name: Attack Zone
description: Attack Zone is an FPS Shooter. You are placed in an attack zone and must fight for your survival.

name: You are Awake Now
description: You're waking up at last. What's everyone been up to while you were gone?

name: Axiom
description: In a cyberpunk world where giant corporations take advantage of their power, only those with the ability to enter the human mind can stop corruption at its source. You are a mind assassin called Miles and this mind-bending first-person action-adventure is your story of revenge.

name: Concrete Tremor
description: "Concrete Tremor" is a short experimental horror game about plastic explosives and soviet apartments, where the story is told from multiple perspectives.

name: Journey to the Blue Mountain
description: An adventure in search of the birds' home.

name: Tiny Civilization
description: This is a historical simulation game that promotes the development of civilization based on the match-3 Game. You'll need to gather resources, use skills, discover new technology, and lead humanbeing through a 10,000-year journey to the cosmos.

name: Project: Summer Ice - Pinball: Mark
description: A game in the "Project: Summer Ice" series!

name: Dolce
description: A visual novel about being stuck in a time loop and talking to friends.

name: Waitventure
description: Idle RPG with automatic battles, enemy recruiting and fusions.

name: Syberia: 20th Anniversary Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Skyratz
description: Take to the air as one of six unique heroes and soar through Avion City as you perform tricky maneuvers, hunt for weapons and armor, and battle in the skies to claim your spot on the pecking order!

name: Sacrarium Gelus
description: Sin descripción

name: Grim Swarm
description: In 20 seconds the infinite swarm of the undead will arrive and there is nothing you can do about it, so collect all your weapons and take down as many zombies as you can to the grave! See how high of a high score you can get to unlock all weapons and hats Inspired by an old flash game called De-animator, check it out if you can!

name: Dirty Cop
description:
A new drug hits the city, you partner is murdered and now you are the prime suspect, will you keep yourself clean, or will you go dirty like everyone else? You choose.

A mix between Hotline Miami and a cop thriller. You are a police officer that through his investigation will have moral choices to make, you can either arrest the suspects, or get high* on their supply while you execute them point blank, the choices you make will change the ending and how you play.

name: Reunion
description: An old classmate asks you to help decorate the auditorium for your high school reunion. You want to say no, but a part of you thinks, why not? A trip down memory lane could be nice. It might help you reconnect with people - and things - long forgotten... Play as Tom in this retro-style point-and-click horror game. Explore your old high school. Hang decorations. Learn about the past, think about the future. Uncover the true meaning of... Reunion.

name: The Golem Maker
description: A short vignette set after The Crystal Golem. Explore a little town and meet its inhabitants. Learn and build something together.

name: Ticky's Wake Up Call
description: In Ticky's Wake Up Call, you play as Ticky, the walking, talking alarm clock! Ticky has a very important job to do, and it's up to you to make sure he does it on time! Dodge traps and solve dangerous situations all while trying to beat the game as fast as possible!

name: Pareicopse
description: Surviving the night in the woods should be easy, as long as you don't wander too far away from camp... Pareicopse is a survival horror experience where you're tasked with finding your camping buddy who has been gone a little too long. Navigate the woods, and stay hidden from things bumping in the night. This game was made for the Haunted PS1 game jam in a little over a month, and released for Halloween.

name: Faces of the Forest
description: A short horror game by Lunar Finch for the 2022 HPS1 Halloween Jam.

name: Braiser
description: You just woke up in the midst of a blazing furnace at the fire station... Will you be able to stand strong against the burning reality ? FIND AND STOP ALL THE FIRES... A short horror game made for the Haunted PS1 Halloween jam 2022 in around 10 days.

name: Wintercoffin
description: You are a hunter trapped in a blizzard. Will you make it back to your camp before you freeze to death? Featuring our own music 'A dark wood of sorrow'. Plus many different ambient sounds. Immerse yourself in this unique retro survival game. A vast and bleak open world awaits!

name: Sailor's Grave
description: To make ends meet a late 19th century merchant steamship takes on some deadly cargo. Things take a turn for the worst and she must get to port before she goes under!

name: Tape of the Ghouls
description: Tape of the ghouls is a VHS found footage survival horror. The game was made in 16 days. This video tape was found in May 2002 in the state of Pennsylvania. This tape reveals the event that unfolded in condemned hostel that was demolished in 1984. The content is beyond explanation and may shock the audience. The recording was code-named Tape of the ghouls. Get ready to watch.

name: The Disciples of the Full Moon
description: The Disciples of the Full Moon is a retro survival horror made for the Reload Magazine Game Jam #1.

name: Unnamed Hero in the Underworld
description: Unnamed Hero in the Underworld is a 3D horror game with EGA graphics. Hades, the god of the dead and the king of the underworld, is going mad. Monsters rise from the grave. The dark forces of the underworld are everywhere... Unnamed hero, please, save Greece!

name: The Maker of Masks
description: A short horror story for the PS1 Horror Jam.

name: Fist 2 Face
description: Battle an evil grocery store clerk who won't stop overcharging you for your food. Keep an eye on the items as he scans them... Punch him if he tries to rip you off! Fist 2 Face will test your observation and reflex skills as the game progressively gets harder! Do you have what it takes?

name: The Man Outside
description: A short, gameboy-like game based on one of the developer's dreams.

name: P.O.S.S.U.M.
description: Explore the city rooftops and a haunted hotel lobby to find artifacts from the past. Made for the Haunted PS1 2021 Madvent calendar.

name: Holi-Zone 97
description: Holi-Zone 97 has been saved from digital obscurity and its restored servers now live in the public domain. Check out the most popular holiday-themed MMO of 1997. 64kb internet connection recommended.

name: TAGAP 4
description:
During his adventures, the cyber-penguin Pablo has saved the world multiple times – from a world-conquering mad scientist, a megalomaniac penguin general and a whole race of space penguins from Pluto. However, an event during his previous adventure has thrown our hero out of this world. Out of this time.
What if Pablo wasn't there to save the world? What if the mad scientist Glowenko wasn't stopped in his tracks, but now rules the world with a rubber glove?
Stuck in an alternate timeline, Pablo has to find a way home while fighting the whole world gone mad.

name: Yona Yona
description:
Nekura Yotarou is an employee of an old-fashioned love hotel "Hotel Yonaguni". One of his hobbies was peeking into the nightly affairs of his guests night after night.

One day while he was doing his usual peeking, he saw something he should not have seen. His destiny changes when he learns of a certain secret of the hotel...

name: Yanderain
description:
Poor communication skills, plain, dumb, poor, and gloomy is all that could be said to describe this story's protagonist, Amatarou, who is an unpopular student with nothing special going for him. He begins to have a secret relationship with Shigure Yadori, an honors student in his class.

When it rains, unbeknownst to anyone, the two of them have a secret rendezvous behind the school building. Forced to do vile crimes and hardcore sexual acts by Yadori, the worthless Amatarou begins to develop a superiority complex from having a secret relationship with her and becomes engulfed in her twisted relationship.

name: Mario Party Superstars: Mario's Rainbow Castle + Luigi's Engine Room
description: Sin descripción

name: Idle Dyson Swarm
description: Manage a solar empire, produce bots which will make solar panels for you. Send your panels to the sun to generate energy and sell that energy to make money which you can spend on even more bots!

name: Fnvader
description: Sin descripción

name: Mega Blaster
description: Use the right force on the TNT plunger to aim for the blocks and demolish the tower.

name: Notenogram
description: Sin descripción

name: Metal Slug 5 Extend
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Mario 64 in Teeworlds/DDNet
description: Sin descripción

name: Dodgeball
description: Sin descripción

name: Hong Kong 97 Gameboy
description: Homebrew port of the unlicensed SNES game of the same name.

name: A Human Haunting!
description: A hidden object game where a ghost looks for signs of a human haunting!

name: Kiwi Life
description: Sin descripción

name: As Aventuras de Kiwi
description: Game developed by IPAE for creationist week 2022.

name: Kiwis Can't Fly
description:
Everyone knows that kiwis can’t fly…

Kiwis Can't Fly is a short musical story about a flightless kiwi bird who loves the sky. Drag various objects into Kiwi's path to bounce off of them during its adventure through the sky.

Kiwis Can't Fly was developed by DDRKirby(ISQ) and Kat Jia, under the Cocoa Moss label. It was originally developed in 72 hours as an entry for round 50 of the Ludum Dare game jam. The theme was "Delay the Inevitable".

name: Pokémon Voyager
description:
You have lived your whole life in Andromeda City, the metropolitan heart of Keplara. Your father works for the Andromeda PD; your mother is the local Antares League, gym leader. Someday you’ll get a Trainer’s License of your own and become a well-regarded Pokémon trainer yourself.

But today is not that day. Instead, today is an exciting day for Andromeda City: your mother’s Antares League gym is moving into the snazziest new digs, all the way up to the top floors of the recently-completed Pokémon community skyscraper! There are still a few things left to move and unpack before the grand opening, but it’s nothing that you and your father can’t handle. What could possibly go wrong?

name: Totally Not Sumo
description: Sin descripción

name: Fierce Soldier
description: A side-scrolling shooter for the Vircon32.

name: Pokémon Crown
description:
Pokémon Crown is an entirely new gameplay experience. While it is still an exploration-focused RPG, we have combined many elements from other genres to create something truly unique. In Pokémon Crown, you will rediscover each Pokémon and how they interact with one another using our new Auto Chess battle engine! Play against interesting and unique teams while strategizing on synergy, placement, and type matchups! 6v6 combat like you’ve never seen before!

Pokémon Crown is a Medieval RPG set in the vast and magical Region of Guelder. Guelder, as a rich resource bastion, was thrust into a long-lasting war. Guelder triumphed after many years, but not without a cost… While the region was rebuilding, the King’s Diviner predicted a dual prophecy for the kingdom: a future of light and a future of darkness. Based on these visions, the King realized that unless something changed, the kingdom was doomed to more war.

name: Chocolate Carol
description: Chocolate Carol is a short visual novel, where you sell hot chocolate to the locals. However, on one fateful night, an unfamiliar patron comes to you with news of a crime that occurred … very near your stall. Can you find the culprit with the clues each of the customers give you?

name: Koppotate's Rescue Mission
description: Sin descripción

name: Rankdle
description:
Rankdle is an interactive game for content creators to react to their viewer submissions!
Players challenge themselves to rank things and go head-to-head with the content creator.

name: Micro Doctor
description:
In Micro Doctor, you play as a tiny doctor who delves into the human body to save lives! The adventure takes place entirely inside the human body, allowing you to explore and learn about the different systems in an exciting and unique way. Your mission is to eliminate germs, bacteria, and viruses that are wreaking havoc on the body. You must take medicine and use your expertise to save the day. This exciting game is based on the real systems of the human body, making it a fun and educational experience for all ages.

As you journey through the human body, you will encounter different systems, including the digestive, respiratory, circulatory, and urinary systems. Each system presents new challenges that will test your skills and knowledge. This game is the ultimate didactic tool, making it a perfect way to teach young children about the human body in an engaging and interactive way.

Micro Doctor is compatible with all Game Boy, Game Boy Color, and Game Boy Advance handhelds, making it accessible to everyone. So what are you waiting for? Join the Micro Doctor on this incredible adventure and become a hero of the human body!

name: The Little Match Girl 2: Annus Evertens
description: The little match girl is hired to assassinate a disgusting old man.

name: Grombcross
description: A picross game for the Dallas Society of Play! Each of the standard puzzles is a different piece of DSOP lore. There are also a variety of bonus puzzles included that are completely random.

name: Tegzer
description: A demake of Japan's best selling action game Thexder in PICO-8.

name: Was/Were
description: Sin descripción

name: Reclusion
description: The year is 2013. An unnamed protagonist, deep in debt, suffering from obesity, sociophobia, and probably other mental disorders, is locked up indefinitely in his apartment. Does he get out alive and sane? It depends only on a strange companion from the future (player) who has established a telepathic connection with him.

name: Hamburger in Space!
description: Sin descripción

name: Gingy's Gift Grab
description: Help Gingy collect as many gifts as possible before the time runs out.

name: Pseudomod
description: Adventure through sewers, creepy houses, forests, caves, mines, underground rivers, dockyard, deserts, boats, prisons, space robots. Drive and race hovercrafts and your desert buggy down the sewers and dangerous desert track. Pseudomod will give you multiple hours of quality singleplayer gameplay and enjoyment.

name: Six. Eight. Two.
description: SCP-682 has escaped its containment cell, MTF group was deployed to contain it. Use guns to severe its limbs and cease its movements or to slow it down. There are 2 control rooms, the first one is for security cameras and the other for Acid. Your goal is to contain SCP-682 by submerging it in Acid.

name: Hakuga
description: Hakuga is a psychedelic, disturbing and abstract horror game where the goal is simply to walk around and explore the things from the disorient world of the game.

name: LEGO Five Nights at Freddy's
description: Sin descripción

name: After Fright
description: Discover what happened after the fire

name: Atari Flashback 50th Anniversary Edition Gold
description: Sin descripción

name: Atari Flashback 50th Anniversary Edition
description:
The Atari Flashback 50th Anniversary Edition was released in 2022 at limited retailers. Physically it is a slight re-coloration of the Atari Flashback X. It features brass switches instead of chrome and has the Atari 50th logo stamped onto its wood veneer trim. Like the previous releases, it was built by AtGames.

The basic model includes two wired standard controllers and 110 games. The gold model includes two wired standard controllers, two wired paddle controllers and 130 games.

name: Angry Neighbor in Town
description: You're neighbor is suspicious! find out what he is doing

name: Ice Scream 7
description:
Lis explores the lab with the help of Mike and Charlie

After escaping from the kitchen, J., Mike and Charlie have gathered in the control room. However, they can't find Lis, and worried, Mike jumps down the pipe she used and reaches the laboratory, where they will have to work together to escape together. At the same time, Charlie travels to the town hidden in Rod's van to find something to help his sister with.
Switch characters between Lis and Mike and exchange items to solve puzzles. Explore new parts of the factory and revisit locations from the early Ice Scream games. Face the Mini-Rods and the ice cream man to finally reunite the 4 friends.

name: Out of Gas
description: Retro horror with PSX style graphics where you run out of gas.

name: Solve The Case
description: Find out all details of the kidnapping through conversations with various people

name: Open Ocarina
description:
Open Ocarina is a PC port of the decompiled The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time originally for the Nintendo 64.

It supports features such as 30-120 fps, free camera, rumble, gyro aim, and HD texture packs.

name: Bobblehead Baseball
description:
Bobblehead Baseball is Andamiro’s newest video redemption game and first licensed title from MLB Players Inc., a subsidiary of the MLBPA.

The new “videdemption” game pits arcade gamers against the bobble-headed avatars of MLB’s biggest stars in this fast-action,

wholesome video game that awards tickets.

The novel game has three adjustable difficulty levels (easy, normal and hard) and its pitchers are programmed to throw fastballs,

curveballs or changeups.

There are seven outfield targets that players can hit or need to avoid.

Aim for the targets with points to accumulate tickets or hit the letters to spell G-R-A-N-D—S-L-A-M to win the Super Bobblehead Bonus.

But try to avoid hitting the out markers – three outs end the game, naturally.

Players apply hand-eye coordination to time their swings and accurately aim the ball.

name: Disney Junior Ready for Preschool: Forces in Motion
description: Work with Spidey and team to stop Rhino while you learn about different types of Force.

name: Life on Mars: Genesis
description: Life on Mars: Genesis is an aftermarket Sega Genesis game.

name: The Winter Games
description: On a cold winter night, the worst members of the naughty list find themselves abducted to the North Pole and forced to play in a series of death games run by a mysterious evil woman claiming to be Santa. Why are they here, and will they survive?

name: Sensory Deprivation Chamber
description: Surreal, sometimes eerie, fast-paced, textureless(-ish, there's only 1 texture that looks like anything) mappack that uses a modified version of supercharge where every monster is a hyper-aggressive non-infighting glass cannon, taking some inspiration from extremely early game builds and tech demos.

name: Trench Runner!
description: Trunkal has the three most coveted moons in the galaxy, natural sources of unique energy power, they generate all the energy for the planet, and there is also all the military defense that has always prevented any attempt at alien invasion, in all there are 72 stations scattered across the moons, but the unlikely happened, the Kirgons, an alien race that consumed all the resources of their planet discovered that Trunkul can become the perfect environment for a new home. Then, one day, 72 machines known as sentinels, invaded Trunkul's defense system and took over the lunar facilities ending all defense of the planet, If that wasn't enough, they also drained the moon's energy to charge a ray that would be fired and annihilate all life on the planet. But the resistance has figured out how to disable the sentinels, and only the best pilot in the galaxy, Michael Gabes aboard the X-1 can accomplish the mission before the beam charges and fires....

name: Rabbit's All-Comers Mapping Project 2022
description:
RAMP 2022 is the second iteration of the Rabbit's All-comers Mapping Project! In June 2022, mappers old and new came together to create their own maps for Doom 2 centered around a gigantic 117-map hub level.

Once again, take the chance to dip into one of the widest variety packs in the Doom community - explore icy castles, wade through flooded techbases, visit hellish caves, and take part in several strange demonic games. Also collect paintings and hang them up around the hub to spruce it up a bit - a massive thanks to the various artists around the Doom fandom that generously provided their artwork for use in the game!

name: Bad Egg
description: One little egg vs an army of zombie chickens! Get to the chopper or you're clucked. A free-range frenzy of arcade action from the yolked-up eggheads behind Shell Shockers.

name: Zero One
description: Sin descripción

name: Monkey Fright
description:
National Institutes of Health (NIH) experimenter Elisabeth Murray has spent the last 30 years cutting open monkeys’ skulls, suctioning out or burning portions of their brains to cause permanent damage, and locking them in cages, where she shows them large rubber snakes and spiders, terrifying them. These horrific experiments haven’t advanced human health at all, of course—they’ve only tormented and killed animals and wasted precious medical resources.

This cruelty is why 16-year-old Archit Kumar of Dublin, California, is on a mission to end speciesism, and he’s developed a video game called Monkey Fright to help accomplish that. The game brings awareness to the constant suffering and deprivation that these monkeys experience inside small, barren cages in windowless laboratories—day in and day out—where they’re denied companionship, sunshine, fresh air, exercise, and everything else they care about.

name: Jurassic World Camp Cretaceous: Hidden Adventure
description: Sin descripción

name: CDO2: Dungeon Defense
description:
You are now a Chief Dungeon Officer (CDO)!
Your one and only mission is to keep your dungeon running as long as possible.
Command the Demon King and deploy monsters to keep out the hordes of heroes!

name: Lone Tower Roguelite Defense
description: Lone Tower is an idle tower defense game with a unique twist of Idle and Roguelike features. Lone Tower is inspired by games such as Oregon Trail and The Tower, it is an incremental tower defense game where you control and upgrade a single tower and have to survive as many days as possible. There is farming, card collecting, mining, and plenty of repairs to do in order to survive each day! Defend your tower until its destroyed, earn coins & gems to unlock permanent upgrades, then give it another try! Build the perfect tower for defense against fantasy creatures and foes!

name: Whole Lotta Lies
description: The game follows a pig named Pixie and her friends, who were torn away from their loving mothers as babies and are being raised on a filthy, barbaric farm. They need your help to stay away from the cruel workers, who are hell-bent on shooting sick and injured pigs and sending the rest on a terrifying trip to the slaughterhouse.

name: Dark Army Resurrection
description: Sin descripción

name: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild - Islands Expansion
description: A mod for The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild which adds new maps in the form of floating islands across Hyrule.

name: Music Diver
description: A rhythm game from Taito where players use drumsticks to hit notes by striking parts of the screen as well as regions of a plastic ring placed around the screen.

name: CubeCrafter
description: Looking for a casual crafting game that combines resource collecting and time management with action and adventure? CubeCraft is an enjoyable and original game that covers all the angles – a world-building simulator where you gather resources, craft all sorts of different structures, get to explore a wide and varied game world, and even do a little fighting now and then. And bear in mind, you can do all that while riding around on the back of a pig! (Not to mention all the sheep, who provide useful wool and get in the way a lot…)

name: Goldheart
description:
A small bullet-hell type game.

The greedy mage Lavka steals a mythical golden sphere from the village and it's up to the villager Skully to retrieve it by directing a wandering spirit's powers.

name: Tree Hole: Adventures In Wonderland
description: While exploring a cave you come across a tree with a magical hole in it. The hole draws you in and everything goes black. Waking up confused about the past events you find out that you ended up in some sort of magical town in which some of its citizens mysteriously disappeared. What happened to the citizens, how can you find your way home and how is all this connected. Your adventure starts now.

name: Play for Granny Grandpa Part 4
description:
Choose for whom you will play granny or grandpa. Both of them are serious rivals and everyone can catch a prisoner.
Make your choice and don't let the prisoner escape from the house.

name: Goblin's Workshop
description: Goblin's Workshop is a simple and easy item making simulation & RPG idle game.

name: Idle Dice 2
description:
The sequel for Idle Dice is here!
Idle Dice 2 expands on the gameplay of its predecessor and adds more things

name: Homeless Life
description:
When playing the role of homeless people, making their living, what will you do to earn money, buy food, find a place to live, life is not easy, surviving in the city is a challenge.
The life of a homeless person, at first you will have to beg for money, the game allows you to earn extra money by buying and changing clothes in the style of the homeless, the fashion of the homeless Also a way to make money.

name: Stickman War: Stick Fight Army
description: Stickman War: Stick Fight Army might be the most addictive stick war mobile game that you have ever enjoyed. This game challenges you to win the Throne by making a strategy to build up your stick Empire and conquering all Enemies.

name: Medieval Merge: Epic Adventure
description: This farm has a story to tell. A land full of mystery awaits! In every corner lies a new discovery in this world of epic adventure as you help our heroine fulfill her quest.

name: Dunlight: Random Defense
description: Dunlight is a random defense game that combines the chess genre and the defense genre. Block monsters in the dungeon with your own choices in a situation of randomly given heroes, items, and options.

name: Idle Tower Defense
description: Idle Tower Defense is an incremental tower defense game. Defend your tower from waves of enemies. Earn coins by defeating enemies to upgrade your tower's abilities.

name: Doomdepths
description: Doomdepths is a turn based roguelite with rpg elements.

name: Cell: Idle Factory Incremental
description: CIFI is a complex incremental idle game with more than meets the eyes. Here, you'll build, grow and upgrade a star fleet of industry & production based ships. The goal is to produce as many cells as possible! Thousands of upgrades await to help you in this particular endeavor!

name: HeroSurvival
description:
The world is in endless chaos, and all creatures are devastated by endless chaos.
You need to eradicate thousands of terror monsters in this chaotic and terrible world, unlock more weapons and skills, and survive to the end. Good luck.

name: Survivor Idle Run
description: Survive the zombie apocalypse and become the ultimate hero in Survivor Idle Run! Take control of your character and battle against hordes of flesh-eating zombies. Along the way, summon powerful allies to fight alongside you and merge them to create even stronger allies. Want to speed up the action? Click to enter fever mode and take down enemies at lightning speed! With idle gameplay, your hero will keep fighting even when you're away. Are you ready to take on the undead and save the world? Join the adventure now and become the ultimate survivor!

name: Idle Dig Gold: Craft Adventure
description: Enter the world of professional gold diggers, explore new lands, dig for gold, fill your ship and take them to conquer new lands! You will enjoy smooth gameplay and super beautiful graphics that we have dedicatedly built and created. Build your strategy and use measures to expand the land, dig a lot of gold and upgrade your boat. This is really an addictive, fresh and unique game that will turn you into a gold digger enthusiast.

name: Knight Hero Adventure idle RPG
description: The world of magic and heroes, in the genre of rpg and roguelike games, needs a sword and bow master to protect it. Brave knight, an ancient evil has attacked the kingdom! The fate of the kingdom is now in your hands, assassin!

name: Longleaf Valley
description: Longleaf Valley is in danger and it’s your job to save it! Design and create your own wildlife reserve: build habitats, rescue animals and restore the forest.

name: Paper Angel
description:
Paper Angel is a short visual novel made in RPG Maker VX Ace. You have become conscious and find yourself taking care of “Spinwhim”. Why? Who know! It is just great that you are here!

Content Warning: Eyestrain, Clusters, Reality Distortion…

name: Soul Launcher!: Tower Defense
description: In Soul World, monsters are tormenting citizens in every corner! The citizens cannot resist the powerful force of the monsters! However, where there is darkness, there is also light.

name: Andy Volcano: Tile Match Story
description: Swap office drudgery for exotic adventure and mystery in this fun puzzle game. Match 3 tiles to clear the board and progress through the exciting story. If you like adventure games with intrigue, humor and challenging puzzles, you’re bound to fall in love with Andy Volcano!

name: Crush the Monsters: Foul Puzzle
description: Make mincemeat out of monsters! In this action puzzle game, you can destroy a variety of monsters in many different ways — blow them up with cannon fire, incinerate them, smash them, chop, saw or tear them to pieces (and that’s not nearly all!) And if regular monsters are too simple for your tastes, test your mettle against the epic bosses of the Underworld!

name: Idle Ant Colony
description: This little idle tycoon game is all about building your own anthill and creating new colonies in different territories. Provide for your ant queen, hatch thousands of workers and establish ant trails to gather food and resources to further your idle ant colony!

name: Gladiators Arena
description: It’s time to attack! Train your troops, upgrade weapons, It’s time to battle it out on the world’s biggest ancient arena. Gather your troops and enter the battlefield. Let’s give our audience one heck of a show!

name: Car Cops
description: It is up to you to make sure everyone has no contraband!

name: Farm Jam: Animal Parking Game
description: Meet the Farm Jam parking game, a brilliant mix of a farming simulator parking games and a traffic puzzle in a beautiful 3D games form. You’ve just bought a ticket for a township farm sightseeing… Take your seats, lads, we’re going to Ol’ Sharpeye’s farmland!

name: Idle Cutter
description: Create your personal sawmill, upgrade your saw and cut as many different logs as possible!

name: Tangerine Clicker
description: Become the richest tangerine farmer in our simulation. Organize the collection of tangerines in the garden with maximum speed and achieve it faster!

name: Idle Quest Giver
description: Ever wanted to start and manage a mercenary guild? Use your tavern as a mercenary base. Attract new mercenaries to your ranks! Add and upgrade new rooms in your tavern. Take care of your heroes otherwise they will not be able to complete quests. Increase your guild rating to have more heroes and more quests!

name: Snowball Go Go Go
description: Have you ever seen snow and rolled over snowballs? I hope to bring a trace of cool to you on the hot summer days.

name: Mr Bea Boy Kart Dash Race
description: Collect the power of Mr funny bean’s Family amulets that transform your character's special power, which will help you along the temple way and run to defeat opponents!

name: Cat Escape! Infinity！
description: Do you like the game of cat and mouse? Are you ready to challenge the squid game and win the final victory to survive? The most popular hide and seek endless version of the game is back again, which adds a lot of Kawaii's cat image and a lot of little girl's skin for you to choose from. look out! The furry cat has begun to look for your trace. Hide and win!

name: Grand War 2
description:
Conquer the turbulent European, and win all the war of history in Europe!
The world is about to change! Build your own empire and command army, and battle as one of the great general from the history of the world.
It is time for you to create winning strategy and tactics, mobilize army and make immortal achievements!

name: Merge Archers: Bow and Arrow
description: Are you ready to fight for your king? Notch your arrows and join the war of bow and arrow! Merge bowmasters and create the strongest stickman archery squad to defend the castle. Play one of the coolest arrow games, become the greatest stickman archer hero and win the bow and arrow war!

name: Mortician Inc.: Idle Empire
description: Build your own idle empire in Mortician Inc. simulation game. Become a well-known graveyard tycoon with a new clicker game! Funeral idle games give you the chance to grow immortal business from scratch: hire staff, buy furniture, expand your funeral home, offer first-class services to your customers, and work up a reputation of the best mortician in town.

name: Street Dude: Homeless Empire
description: Sin descripción

name: Hamster Escapes: Minnie Pets!
description: Save the hamster family from evil Dr. Hooman!

name: Silent Apartment
description: It's nighttime and the dormitory, often rumoured to be haunted by spirits, awaits its other prey.

name: 456 Survival Battle
description: Survival Battle, also known as Squid Game, is an intense and thrilling online game that challenges players to compete in a series of survival challenges.

name: Bud Farm: Munchie Match
description: Match Gummies and Get the Munchies! Join Shorty and friends in matching their way through munchies and fixing up their empty mansion into a far-out hangout pad and marijuana farm!

name: Fight For America: Country War
description: Fight for America is a tactical and strategy tower defense game where you must battle your way across the country in a quest for conquest, liberating one state after state io from its enemies and showing your patriotism at its fullest potential.

name: Space Survivor
description: The darkness is coming!! The silence is covering your spaceship step by step! The silent rooms. Some scary things are inside your spaceship… they are haunting you.

name: Bird Sort: Color Puzzle
description: Bird Sort - Color Puzzle - Sorting puzzle game with a unique art style, a collection of colorful birds.

name: Melon Journey Pocket
description:
Melon Journey Pocket is a re/demake of the classic adventure released back in 2012, this time playable on your Game Boy!

Melon Journey in your Pocket~!

name: Futuructa: Merge the Future
description: A brilliant scientist Kiana created Futuructa – a computer-simulated reality designed to help people get smart like never before.

name: Pokémon Bizarre
description: Pokémon Bizarre is a Spanish-language fangame created by developer MrGrossi, also author of District Dance Battle, Motor Casa Paco, Vaya Canicastañazos, Mauriçius Nativitatem, FDI, A Toda Pastilla and Louse on the Loose. You will give life to a character who has been forced to explore the quirky and amazing Pokemon region known as Quintueles. In the process you can train up to eight generations of Pokémon, visit eight different gyms, meet new stupid characters and embark on a multitude of missions that involve things such as going to a rave, fight malicious octopuses and chit-chat with the famous "Alien Fumeta".

name: Tower Gun: Zombie Shooter 3D
description: The zombie army has taken over the entire castle. The last tower remained in which all the survivors found refuge. Don't let the zombies break into the last shelter!

name: Idle Dungeon Tycoon
description: Become a real dungeon tycoon by managing your heroes and idle profit and defeat enough monsters to improve your heroes in this simulation game!

name: Save The Dog
description: Save The Dog is a casual puzzle game. You draw lines with your fingers to create walls that protect the dog from attacks by bees in the hive. You need to protect the dog with the painted wall for 10 seconds during the attack of the bees, hold on and you will win the game. Use your brain to save the doge.

name: Lackgirl I: Astra Inclinant, sed Non Obligant.
description: A visual novel about a magic battle between girls. Iris" is a boarding school where students learn about magic. The girls gathered there all have mental defects. This is a story of magical girls with flawed minds and their battles and growth.

name: Dango Thief
description: Kazuki awakes one morning to find that he no longer exists. Play a game of hide n' seek in this psychological horror RPG game in order to reclaim his existence. You only have 7 days to win. Explore the town by day, survive fatal nightmares by night, and discover the mysteries of the Dreamscape.

name: Paper Snow
description:
Paper Snow is a yuri kinetic novel about the pain and joy of knowing someone you love is happy without you.

At some point in life, your path might diverge from the people you least expect to say goodbye to. There is no set when and where for this momentous event. No red circled reminder on a calendar, no ear-marked page on a journal. There is no indicator for the last time you’ll ever meet someone. Only the memory of it, after it’s all over.

name: Angry Neighbor: The Temporary Neighbor
description:
You moved into a new house for a while and you see new person settling in the neighborhood. It seemed strange from day one, and now you've decided to break into his house and solve its mysteries.

Go into the neighbor's house and find neighbor's secrets but try not to be seen. Otherwise it will get worse.

name: Steel Wool Studios Bundle
description:
From the Studio that brought you 'Five Nights at Freddy's: Help Wanted' and 'Five Nights at Freddy's: Security Breach' comes this collection of 3 of their classic VR titles!

Bounce is a VR physics-based puzzle game for the HTC Vive and Oculus Touch. Under the supervision of H8-Bit and 2Bit, two robots tasked with overseeing security of the intergalactic spaceship, players must help D1G-B, their spherical robot companion, traverse levels using an array of gadgets at their disposal to exit each level’s portal. With moving obstacles, laser gates, gravity wells, and multi-floor levels obstructing the path of D1G-B, players will have to use their creativity to construct solutions.

Quar: Battle for Gate 18 is a turn-based strategic VR game set in the grimsical world of Alwyd. The Quar are cute alien ant-eaters. Don't mistake cute for gentle. They use their WW1 level technology to wage war across the face of their world.

Mars Odyssey is a single player VR simulator experience. Land on the red planet. Walk the surface of Mars in your living room and interact with full-scale, realistic NASA Landers and Rovers. Learn about the Red Planet, its history, and its geography in this interactive experience. Play time: 20 min.

name: Demon's Gamble
description:
A mechanical A.I. God has kept you alive for one thousand years.
It wants to play a game to finally let you die.
Roll the dice, will you escape your fate or face an eternity of horror?

name: Stickman Pixel Archer
description:
Massive enemy armies are coming with ultimate weapons. You are the last surviving archer on a mission to defeat all who stand in your way. Pick your ancestors' most precious and powerful bow to take them down. Archery with fire, ice, or poison, it's your choice. Bring a painful and quick death to the enemy.

The game is simple: Drag and drop to shoot arrows. Try to shoot straight in the head for instant victory. Four power-ups can help you in the battle: Heal, Shield, Arrow Shower, and Teleport.

Be careful, your enemies are training every day, and make sure your gear is upgraded.

name: Legend of Slime: Idle RPG
description: Bad humans have invaded the peaceful monster forest! Begin your adventure as a brave Slime and bring peace to the monster forest.

name: Hunted: Kalevala
description: Get your knife, get your spear. There is a monster on the loose. Shout Perkele, and kill the beast.

name: Tetris Keyring Arcade
description: Tetris Keyring Arcade is a hand held version of Tetris released by Fizz Creations in 2022.

name: Tetris Arcade in a Tin
description: Tetris Arcade in a Tin is a hand held version of Tetris released by Fizz Creations in 2022. As its name implies, it is a portable game of Tetris contained in a tin similar to those used for Altoids mints.

name: Amogus.io
description: Capture territories on a giant arena in Among Us as iconic impostors and crewmembers.

name: Magic Pixel Survival
description: Sin descripción

name: F Class Adventurer
description: Sin descripción

name: Saikoro Saiko Sebunsu Hebun
description: "All the heroines are psychopaths!" Can you capture the dangerous psychopathic girls who will try to harm you at any chance?

name: Spidey & His Amazing Friends
description: Go on adventures with Peter Parker, Miles Morales and Gwen Stacy with the Spidey Learning Watch! Hear Spidey say fun phrases and listen as the narrator guides you through games that focus on hand-eye coordination, counting, matching and more to complete crime-fighting adventures. Dodge Doc Ocks lasers to help Spidey get the stolen Energy Star back, count bubbles to blast Green Goblins glider, match patterns to find the missing scooter and choose the correct letter to catch Rhino. Digital clock faces feature Spidey and His Amazing Friends, and time tools include a stopwatch, timer, alarm and cuckoo clock. Go webs go!

name: Fallout 2 Remake
description: An enthusiast with the nickname ConstructVOD released an early version of his own remake of the iconic Fallout 2 on a different engine. Anyone can download it for free. In addition, you can evaluate the project directly in the browser.

name: A Mall Near You
description: Explore the still-intact wings of a mostly-abandoned mall, soak in the atmosphere and holiday vibes, and discover love again in this festive feast for your fearful, frosty fingers.

name: Quiz Thiz United Kingdom: Gold Edition
description: Are you the new quiz master and can you beat your friends on this quiz? Answer questions about this country and collect valuable points! Also, learn new facts about this country while playing!

name: Super Arrow Online
description: Sin descripción

name: Home Pin 2: Family Adventure
description: Sin descripción

name: Party Quiz Mega Q 2022
description: Party Quiz Mega Q 2022 is an updated version of the 1993 Mega Drive Game Party Quiz Mega Q with updated questions. It was released exclusively on the Mega Drive Mini 2 in Japan.

name: Flagi
description: Fight your way to victory!

name: Feeling Arrow
description: Experience hilarious scenarios with a unique twist in Feeling Arrow! Take on the role of an archer armed with feeling imbued arrows, using them to solve various scenarios in a funny and unconventional way.

name: Control(s)
description:
Control(s) is a compact puzzle game where you assume the role of a player who is in charge of controlling another player, who in turn is controlled by yet another player, and so on.

In the game, you enter an Arcade Game Center and navigate your way through various rooms. Your objective is to reach the exit by manipulating different characters through arcade gameplay. Each arcade machine grants unique abilities, such as the power to move blocks or teleport between them.

name: Beyond Contact
description:
Beyond Contact is a fiercely formidable survival game, inspired by the art and style of pulp science-fiction comics, the moral dilemmas of contemporary science-fiction films, and the unforgiving gameplay of survival genre classics.

Taking place on the often mysterious and always deadly, procedurally-generated, alien world of Ketern, Beyond Contact features exploration and discovery, a robust system of research and crafting, intuitive base building and defense, farming and creature feeding, narrative-driven objectives to save the inhabitants of the planet, and enough flora, fauna, extreme weather, and environmental hazards to kill even the toughest players 1000 times over... and trust us if the planet gets the chance, it will.

name: Gravewood High
description: An infinitely replayable stealth horror game set in high school - with destructible environments, randomized level layouts and a smart opponent that develops new abilities the more you play.

name: Powa!
description:
Powa! is a newly-developed action-platformer in a similar vein as other genre-classics of the handheld, like Kirby's Dreamland and Trip World.

The gameplay is decidedly kept simple and makes Powa! easy to pick it up, but challenging to conquer. A good variety of level themes and obstacles, with an ever-increasing difficulty curve keep the experience thoroughly engaging and fresh!

name: Kazue World
description: It's a shelljumps hack, with not too difficult tricks.

name: Castlevania: The Seal Of The Curse X
description: TSOTC Version X is a 10 Years Anniversary edition of The Seal of The Curse, a fan-made sequel to Castlevania: Simon's Quest.

name: Duendes in New Year 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Minigolf
description: Sin descripción

name: The Jiang Shi
description: This is an independently developed game based on Chinese folklore zombies. It tells the story of the player playing the role of demon catcher who goes deep into the ancient town of corpses and subdues the zombies through level by level investigation.

name: No-good Noelle
description: Noelle and Ivy's friendship starts falling apart when only one of them gets accepted as a Snowflake Maker apprentice. Will you attempt to fix things, or move on to something even worse?

name: Sid Meier's Civilization VI: Jinx Pack
description:
A mod that adds the Zaun civilization with its Leader Jinx.
Playing as her gives you:

- Unique building (Arsenal of Deadly Weapons)
- Unique agenda (The Loose Cannon)
- Adds civilization color schemes to the game
- And much more!

name: ZodiaX
description: ZodiaX is a turn-based roguelike where you, as one of the twelve zodiacs, have to un-corrupt your siblings and stop this malevolent being!

name: Corruption
description:
Corruption is a thirty-five level MBF21 mapset created by @NinjaDelphox, @EVILNECK, and @Arsinikk, comprised of detailed and action heavy maps inspired by Back to Saturn X2 and Hell Revealed II, along with other games such as Final Fantasy, Castlevania, Ninja Gaiden, Metroid, Resident Evil, and Mega Man.

Extensive sprite, sound effect, and dehacked changes have been created and used for Corruption to tie in with its story and provide a much more unique experience than a standard Doom II mapset. A lot of attention to detail has also been paid to various source port extras such as GLDEFS, custom obituaries for monsters, edited menu graphics, additional enemies in the ending cast call, and much more.

Every Map has been designed to be able to be pistol started, but I highly recommend not doing that on a first playthrough. Normal mode is the intended way to experience the game, but medium and easy difficulties have been implemented, as well as a new harder difficulty called “Xtreme” (Ultra-Violence Plus), and on ZDoom ports there is an OHKO mode where both players and demons die instantly to any damage.

name: New Years Eve Slaughter 2022
description: This wad contains 5 short slaughter-ish maps (plus 1 bookend map) that are all fairly difficult.

name: Epic Assassin
description: Epic Assassin - Bad Dudes are invading the Realm. The Queen has hired an Epic Assassin to Kill Them.

name: SuperTripLand
description:
Welcome to SuperTripLand!

Join forces with players from around the world or engage in intense arena battles. Complete challenging quests, collect TripCoins, and visit the in-game shop to purchase items and upgrade your gameplay.

name: Lontra-Metragem
description: In the city of Lontrina, the last rental company in the world is on the rise! Several cinephile animals from all over the country are eager to visit it. Among them, a very astute otter, who is not there to rent DVDs. Guide this little thief through this sprawling video store, slipping out of sight of the staff to complete her mission: borrow lots of DVDs… …without warning! And, of course, without getting caught, because you need to take these DVDs to your neighborhood otters!

name: My Grandparents' Christmas Mystery
description: Grandma never showed up and Grandpa's tragic passing 3 days later left me in anger, confusion and sadness. I couldn't just let this go like it never happened, so I decided to go and find out what happened on my own. Will you survive a first-person psychological horror game and uncover the mystery?

name: The Bogtavern
description: Escape the shady brackwater swamp together with the Professor and the Captn in a small Cutter, in a short, text-heavy, linear Horror-Adventure (without Jumpscares).

name: Hentai Miko
description: Hentai Miko is a relaxing puzzle game. With the theme of miko and 24 unique sexy girls. Enjoy sexy girls pictures and relaxing music to complete the puzzle.

name: There's Something in the Pipes
description: You are the owner of a movie rental store. You have one hour until your shift. You need a shower. The shower is full of blood. Go figure.

name: Aircraft Pushback Simulator
description: Attention, Attention!!! In 30 minutes, the gates open to the Rome-Madrid flight.

name: Knights & Guns: Premium Edition
description: Knights & Guns: Premium Edition is a digital bundle that contains the base game and Expansion Pack #2 which adds 10 new levels, five new armors and some new enemies.

name: WJMax
description: This is a fan game of streamer "woowakgood."

name: A Slight Chance of Sawblades
description: Dodge, jump and somersault over razor-sharp sawblades in an attempt to survive the deadly storm! Compete in the global leaderboard for the spot of the best blade-jumper. Unlock quirky and outlandish characters to join in the blade jumping mayhem!

name: Subtransit Drive
description:
Realistic subway simulator

Feel what it’s like to drive a real train anytime and anywhere. Operate a vehicle with fully simulated internal systems in a highly realistic environment following a strict driving schedule and learning operating procedures on your own or with your friends in multiplayer.

name: Breakfast Bar Tycoon: Premium Edition
description:
Have you ever wondered what it’s like to run your own breakfast kitchen?

In Breakfast Bar Tycoon, you'll learn that it's no easy task!

name: Blue Lock Project: World Champion
description:
Blue Lock Project: World Champion, based on the TV soccer anime "Blue Lock".
Players can enjoy their amazing storyline while raising the striker, form the strongest team, engage in fierce battles with rivals!
Players cab also relive the original story of the anime and fully enjoy the worldview of Blue Lock.

name: Cario 4
description: Cario continues his dangerous ride. Help him get as far as possible and get the highest score possible. Good luck on your journey!

name: Bird Shooter
description: Shoot birds, earn money and advance to next level.

name: The Professional
description: The Professional is a physics-based heist game made by Torfi Asgeirsson.

name: Don't Blame You
description: Henry a young adult, for the first time receives his girlfriend at his house, after a night of movies and conversations Kimberly his girlfriend disappears, he looks for her around the house and when he finds her he has bad news.

name: Christmas Wonderland 13: Collector's Edition
description:
Santa’s Magical Christmas Wonderland Adventure for All the Family to Enjoy! Enjoy magnificent Holiday Festivities in Springfield. Help Santa at the North Pole.

The Collector’s Edition includes:
- Check out spectacular bonus locations for more holiday fun!
- Enjoy exclusive wallpapers and seasonal soundtrack
- Explore the mega collection of bonus puzzles
- Earn special Extreme Mode rewards

name: JB Hunter: Adventure
description: Our character - blogger and prankster. All what he doing is attract new subscribers to his blog. He delve on private beach, which only for girls, where he steal beach accessories and swimwear they have. But be careful, girls can punish your character if you are too brazen.

name: The Apple Tree
description: The Apple Tree is an interactive story in the genre of a visual novel. Investigate a series of murders together with police Captain Christian Tyler and try not to fall into the trap of criminals!

name: Concordia: Digital Edition - Britannia & Germania
description: An official DLC to Concordia: Digital Edition adding two new maps - Britannia and Germania with their unique mechanics - all of which will add variety and new challenges to your games!

name: Concordia: Digital Edition - Fish Market
description: An official DLC to Concordia: Digital Edition adding two new maps - Balearica and Cyprvs - and Fish Market game variant - all of which will add variety and new challenges to your games!

name: Into the Waves
description: Morin is a barkeeper with an unusual curse. All people look like shadows to him, except for one mysterious stranger... Solve the mystery of the curse, fight true darkness and mix the most unusual cocktails in the atmospheric visual novel — Into the Waves!

name: Sadness of Valor
description: Commander aboard the Global Support Orbital Station (GSOS-3) capable of intervening rapidly on a part of the planet, ensuring the sustainability of humanity. Nothing ever goes as planned. Face the chaotic desert left by the planet and discover the mysteries of its history. In this RTS, alternate between management and combat with friends or soon on a machmaking!

name: Guardian Goddess
description: The heroine with a mysterious past gets a job in a store in the underworld. A male doll will help her with this work.

name: Gumrun
description: The goal of this jump 'n' run multiplayer racing game is to use the weapons and items in-game to achieve victory and collect the most coins. Those can be spent to unlock new skins and weapons for your next run. You can play online against up to 9 other players or compete with a bunch of your friends in a private session.

name: Luce's Journey: A Victorian Trading Tale
description:
Embark on a journey through the Victorian era as Luce, a young child determined to survive the harsh winter months.
In this survival experience, you'll need to manage your resources carefully, keeping track of hunger, cold, money, and, of course, your most valuable resource – matches.
You'll need to make strategic decisions about when to trade your matches. Buying them at a low price and selling them at a higher price is key to your success. But be warned – the market can be unpredictable, and you'll need to keep an eye on the daily match price.
Experience the thrill of the trade as you work to survive and thrive in this harsh and cruel society.

name: 100% Orange Juice: Sweet Gods Pack
description: This Extra Character Pack for 100% Orange Juice adds 3 legendary Sweet Gods: the mysterious Sweet Creator, Sweet Maker (Saki), and Sweet Blogger (Natsumi), as well as character and announcer voices for them!

name: Hexagolines
description:
Hexagolines, the block puzzle game that challenges you to strategically form lines in a hexagonal grid! Dive into a captivating world where strategic space clearing is the key to success.

No internet connection required, Hexagolines is the perfect companion for your commute or leisure time. Explore various block shapes, such as C, V, O, line, triangle, Z, and more, and cleverly use them to create lines in the hexagonal grid.

The simple and addictive gameplay allows you to drag and drop blocks to form lines. But beware, each completed line clears space for new blocks, so you must think carefully about each move to maximize your score.

Hexagolines offers six unique game modes to cater to all players. Immerse yourself in the infinite mode and keep playing as long as there is space for the remaining blocks, or challenge the clock in timed modes where you have 4 minutes to achieve the highest score.

Compete with friends and family to reach the top scores and become the master of Hexagolines. Train your thinking skills and have fun while playing Hexagolines, as block puzzle games are known to stimulate thinking and problem-solving abilities.

name: Hot Cocoa Magic!
description: "Hot Cocoa Magic!" is a kinetic visual novel about a socially anxious witch and the power of hot cocoa!

name: Southern Cross
description: The tale of a wandering swordsman seeking the Strongest, at the end of his journey.

name: Szybowcowa '87
description: Step back in time to the 1980s and step inside an apartment in a modernistic block in Wrocław that houses a secret printing house of Fighting Solidarity. Discover in VR authentic digitalized collections of the Institute of National Remembrance.

name: Miss Lu
description: Miss Lu is a lovely girl. After the encounter in the game, she yearns for it all the time!

name: Pot Farmer
description: Pot Farmer is a simple 2D pixel art farming game.

name: Farming Real Simulation Tractor, Combine Trucks Farmer Land Game
description: Welcome to the game in which you have to drive a transport on a farm, deliver various goods for farming and also harvest from the land that you will soon prepare for another crop.

name: Infected run to Survive: Zombie Apocalypse Survival Story Shooter Dead Cry
description: Run or die! Can you reach the final survival point? along the way you will meet numerous obstacles and difficulties. A game that sends you into the cruel world of the zombie apocalypse where the dead are teeming all around.

name: Gone Fishin' with Archimedes
description: Seasaw based fishing game for the playdate

name: Pocket Pet
description: A digital pet for the Play Date!

name: As Long As It's Not Illegal: Act I
description: It's Friday night, you and the other Senior Elites devise a plan to throw a party at the rival campus. Carpool across Suncity limits, down into the lawless land of the Undercity. It's Illegal for these two cities to mingle. But is it illegal if... you're never caught?

name: Rights of Progression
description:
You are the Arbiter.

As planets apply to join your alliance of planets, it is up to you to approve or deny each request. It is your judgement, and their future lies in your hands.

name: Monster Impossible Truck No Limit Adventure Drive Simulator Sport 3D
description: A single player game in which you can feel like the drivers of a monster truck. Passing through many obstacles that become more difficult with each level, you can test your skills as a skilled monster truck driver.

name: Malfunction II
description: Malfunction II is a journey that'll feature vast exploration and difficult obstacles to overcome. Danger burdens the universe like never before as the Plague has overtaken it's creators and shows no sign of diminishment. Your mission is to take control of the Plague and destroy it- once and for all.

name: Gambit
description: Sin descripción

name: Surrender 2
description: Surrender, Book 2 is the second and final book of the Surrender series. It succeeds its first book, Surrender, Book 1.

name: Beast Lord: The New Land
description: The climate suffered from an abrupt change, and resources are scarce. To survive and thrive, as a lord, you decided to search for new territory. After going through all kinds of hardships, you finally found a piece of fertile land. However, the seemingly peaceful new territory is full of hidden dangers.

name: It's a Block-Pushing Game
description: Push block? Push block! Block-pushing! Push! Block! Push! Block! Push! Push!

name: AiCaterine
description:
A fan game for AiCaterine, the magical time-traveling elf!

AiCaterine found a mysterious artifact that sends her into the far future. Help her repair the artifact and return to her own time!

name: To the Top
description: It's her wish that you climb to the top. It's mine to make you angry doing it.

name: Horror Night: The Slenderman Takings
description: The most famous creepypasta has finally arrived to Horror Night's universe, to hunt all survivors down in a much more terrifying new map: The Forest. Play with your friends against an AI Slenderman, while trying to solve multiple puzzles to escape.

name: Bike Arena
description: Welcome to the arena of 2 wheelers. Only true enthusiasts will cross the threshold here.

name: New Yankee: Karma Tales
description: A normally-steady stream of silk, spices and other curiosities into Camelot has dried up and it’s down to John, Mary and friends to find out why! What happened to the raja who usually ships these goods? Is he in danger or is there another reason for his disappearance?

name: Time Thief
description: This is a funny action game without language barriers. Operate the phantom thief Bunny Moon to steal the treasures of each stage, and watch Bunny Moon's fantasy adventure!

name: BumpUpGhostBuster
description: This is a one-player horror game in which you must defeat the ghosts that lurk in the field. Search for invisible ghosts by relying on sound, and defeat them without being found by the ghosts. If the ghost finds you

name: Warrior Paint: 2005 GOTY Edition
description: A first person shooter based on WWII, single player game.

name: That's a lot of pixels!
description: That's a lot of pixels! is a fast-paced retro mini-games compilation, it features a wide variety of genres: rogue-like, platformer, puzzle, shooters, beat'em up, ….

name: Elsp
description: A Doom II mod.

name: Balls of Steel Community Project
description: Map design philosophies in the main maps include: kind to blind players, balance for players who don't find secrets, balance between routes, mappers are competent at beating their own maps. Lots and lots of playtesting...

name: The Spidy Quiz
description: Learn some amazing facts about the Spiders in this quiz game.

name: Bengan Yes
description: Bengan Yes is an action-packed arena fighting game designed for livestreaming. Choose to either let your viewers brawl it out or simulate a clash between thousands of bots. Everyone has an equal chance of winning with both the arena and stats of players being randomized.

name: World II World
description: A new RPG made for iOS and Android.

name: Quaver
description: Quaver is a community-driven and open-source competitive rhythm game with two game modes and online leaderboards. Create your own maps or challenge the world in online multiplayer matches.

name: When Trees Turn to Ice
description: This game was created for the Winter VN Jam 2022. It's a spinoff to Lovewood, but you don't need pre-knowledge to understand and enjoy the story of When Trees Turn to Ice.

name: The Present
description: A Short Horror Game about receiving Presents on Christmas! However, the presents may not be pleasant...

name: Captivity Horror Multiplayer
description:
Captivity is a multiplayer horror game in which you play the role of a patient who was being used as a guinea pig for multiple terrible experiments carried out by a corporation that was working on a top-secret government project for a long time until something went wrong.

Your mission is to ally with other patients to get out of the facility, but it won't be easy since the place is full of hostile patients, good luck!

name: Tempus is the Ignis
description: Medium sized industrial Cr8 base map, a remix of rd1m4 from Runner's Delight (1999). Built on Alkaline 1.2 RC1 devkit (already included). Map source is included too.

name: Ant Fight
description: Have you watched the battle between ants? Tiny ants seem to be weak, but the united ant army can burst into huge energy! In the ant fight, command an army of ants to win the final victory！

name: Tales of Tsuki: Moon Guardians
description: Follow the journey of Miyuki and her fellow priestesses of the goddess Tsuki on an exciting adventure through the lands of Getsuga, battling fierce monsters and exploring and meeting the characters in this land full of mystery and wonder where an ancient evil roams the shadows.

name: Master of Puppets
description: Turn based strategy game with resource management and a deck building mechanic

name: Holy Paladin Cynthia
description: A classic RPG about one girl's journey to save the world—and become a true Holy Paladin!

name: Christmas Fables: Holiday Guardians Collector's Edition
description: It's time to make your choice! In the new game you have to bring Santa to children despite the odds using your wits and the Christmas spirit!

name: I Commissioned Some Bees: 12 Days
description: The brief was simple. Artists were commissioned to create a fantasy Christmas/winter world, and hide as many bees as they can inside it. Now it’s your job to find them all! With 15 art pieces to choose from, and 1500+ bees, you will have a lot of searching to do.

name: Fallen London: Stolen Stanzas
description: This is a DLC for the game Fallen London. It is part of the Exceptional Stories, a monthly release of new stories that are available for subscribers (Exceptional Friends) for free, and available for purchase afterwards.

name: No More Money
description: A visual novel in which you play as a 20 year old man forced to move to a new city after his family lost all of their money.

name: The Passenger
description:
When your eldritch existence is threatened by another unthinkable creature, you find yourself jumping dimensions to escape your ghastly fate. Safe for now, your moment of respite is short-lived as you realize you're stuck on Earth, trapped inside a dumb human larva, and with no clue of how much energy you'll need to leave this horrible place behind.

Twenty-six years later you're still stranded on an absurd planet, you have a mom and a sister, and a job delivering baked goods. Not only that, but the creature that almost ate you all those years ago never really stopped looking for you. However, there’s no way it will pinpoint your actual location… right?

Will you break free from your prison of flesh?

name: Trophy Chaser
description: Help the Hero to collect all the trophys to be the master of the achievements! Trophy Chaser is a Rêtro platformer game where you have to collect the trophys to get the achievements, are you able to collect them all? Prove it in the gamer way!

name: Jianghu Survivor
description: This is a light casual game of roguelite with Chinese style. Fight your way out of the monsters, either alone or with a group of three or four friends. Play as different characters, form a unique Build game, defeat the final monster, enjoy killing monsters!

name: XanChuchamel
description: XanChuchamel is a puzzle-platformer where you will need skill but also intelligence to overcome each challenge. Xan can catch blocks and place them in different places to access new areas. 50 levels are waiting for you!

name: Codename Prodigy
description: A mix between 2D traditional and platform fighting games. Codename Prodigy focuses on allowing the player to use the stage against their opponent with unique stage hazards, health-stealing floors, and destructible walls.

name: Time Pilot Demake
description: A PICO-8 demake of the classic Konami arcade game Time Pilot (1982).

name: Let's Sing 2023: Christmas Hits Song Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Semaforo Climber
description: Sin descripción
