description:
Show off your eggsquisite taste with these hard-boiled heroes!

Includes:
Free Range (Whole Costume)
Chicken Out (Whole Costume)
600 x Show-Bucks!

name: HappySnowMan
description: The purpose of this game is to travel through various platforms to the last island. Run to the stable on the last island. Depending on which platform you step on, the speed of movement and jumping power will vary. Don't forget to save your progress by pressing the 'E' key on the island's landmark.

name: Fushigi no Daibouken Chiruno Kenzan!
description: Sin descripción

name: Legend of Edda Brasil
description: MMORPG para PC grátis em português inspirado em clássicos! Jogue com seus amigos num universo inspirado pela mitologia grega!

name: Lord of Dragons
description:
Lord of Dragons is a play-to-earn MMORPG where you get to enjoy innovative gameplay, weapon switching, skills transformation, and many other features. There are much more contents to enjoy when you hit maximum levels!

You will hunt monsters and objects through siege items and eventually get an enormous reward! You can choose to play solo or in a guild in Lord of Dragons.

Extensive world, terrifying creatures, and intricate storylines along with high-end weapons, character transformations, and equipment growth – these are what makes up a good game and awaits you in ”Lord of Dragons”!

name: Fast Food Chef
description: Fast Food Chef is a sim-cooking game in which you have the role of making the best food in town with the goal of having as many customers as possible and making as much money as possible to expand the restaurant to other countries.

name: Graceward: Complete Edition
description: On the run for her life, expelled from a dying city into haunted country, Renee has no choice but to befriend whomever she can- and kill everyone else. In Graceward, all things finish packed down in dark earth.

name: Jigsaw Masterpieces: Iceland - Most Beautiful Places in the World
description: This is the additional puzzle pack for "Jigsaw Masterpieces".

description: This is the additional puzzle pack for "Jigsaw Masterpieces".

description: This is the additional puzzle pack for "Jigsaw Masterpieces".

description: This is the additional puzzle pack for "Jigsaw Masterpieces".

description: Includes the ‘Empathy’, ‘Smoke ‘em’ and ‘CyberDance EuroMix’ DLC packs.

description: An excellent introduction for children to learning writing, counting, improving motor and visual skills.

name: Checkers Quest Bundle
description: Capture them all!

name: Pixel Family Fun
description: Have fun and relax in Pixel Family Fun. Choose from a wide range of drawings and expand your pixel art gallery!

name: Street Drag Racing Car Driving Simulator 2022 Games
description: Compete with your friends in car drag racing, tuning shows, car driving skills. Feel the extreme car racing experience. Have the fun.

name: Everybody's Home Run Derby
description: Win the home run derby!

name: Grabitoons!
description: Compete with your friends and smack 'em over the head in this physics-based galactic party game for up to four players!

name: Kids Puzzle - 2 in 1 Bundle
description: Classic jigsaw puzzles for fun and relaxation!

name: ABC Follow Me: Food Festival
description: ABC Follow Me is the perfect game for kids to write their first words and learn the alphabet, numbers, foods and English!

name: Supreme Car Race on Highway Simulator: Ultimate Driving Games Poly Experience
description: Welcome to Supreme Car Race on Highway Simulator! Let's see how good are you. Get your favorite car and get on the road!

name: Super Puzzle Pack 2
description: Super Puzzle Pack 2 brings together 800+ unique puzzles played across six different puzzle types. Play solo or with family and friends up to 4 players.

name: Those Who Crawl
description:
As you progressed through the cave tunnels, they slowly tightened until you could not even stand. Now, as you crawl, you wonder if you are not alone in the darkness.

Those Who Crawl is a short but tense horror game about crawling and climbing through tunnels.

Each hand is controlled individually with a unique crawling and climbing system. Use the mouse buttons or Q / E to move around, and Hold space to interact or use items.

The game is about a half-hour long and features AI monsters, environmental hazards, climbing, and crawling.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Ancient Dungeon
description: The Legend of Zelda: Ancient Dungeon is a completely new way to play the original The Legend of Zelda on NES. This romhack makes The Legend of Zelda play like a roguelike. Venture through a randomized, ever-changing dungeon with progressive difficulty the further you go. Collect classic items and upgrades, and battle familiar foes throughout your journey. Every playthrough is different. Ganon is lurking deep within the dungeon, but beware, for if you perish, you’ll have to start all over from the beginning. Are you up to the challenge?

name: Who Knocks
description: Who Knocks is a first person psychological horror game that will make your nightmares come true. You have just moved into a new home. Welcome the presences that will knock at your door. Solve puzzles, explore the environment and fight your nightmares.

name: Humongous Classic Collection
description:
The Humongous Classic Collection includes these 6 titles on Nintendo Switch.

• Pajama Sam: No Need to Hide When It’s Dark Outside
• Pajama Sam 2: Thunder and Lightning Aren’t So Frightening
• Freddi Fish 3: The Case of the Stolen Conch Shell
• Putt-Putt Saves the Zoo
• Putt-Putt Travels Through Time
• Spy Fox in “Dry Cereal”

These games will provide limitless hours of fun and replay-ability with full animation, professional voice acting, award-winning music and tons of mysteries to solve!

name: Quest Hunter: Strangewood
description: Strangewood is a story addition to Quest Hunter. Explore new locations, fight with new enemies, solve puzzles with new mechanics. Level up new skills and get new weapons and equipment. Play alone or together with your old and new friends!

name: Postal F: The Thursday Expansion - A Mod for Friday Night Funkin'.
description:
After the events of the first week, the dude sees himself encountering a familiar face: Krotchy! Go up against Krotchy in a new nutsack wrenchin' week, along with another song we can't seem to figure out!

Boyfriend seems to have found himself in a sticky situation when he enters the wrong side of town...

Postal F: Apocalypse Friday is a mod based around the Postal franchise, created by Running with Scissors Studios. In this mod, you go against the infamous "Postal Dude" in a 2 song mania featuring Boyfriend and a familiar Redhead. Will you survive or regret your decision? On behalf of the mod team, we all hope you have an enjoyable experience. This mod started out simply as only a cover but evolved into a 2 month long passion project.

name: Gamma Protocol
description: Survive waves of enemies on a hostile alien world and contend with random modifiers every 10 seconds. Find new weapons scattered across the map. Watch your stats and try to use the most optimal damage type. How many waves will you survive?

name: Final Paradox
description: Final Paradox is a minecraft CTM map where you will find an immersive story and a deep lore, with interesting characters and memorable antagonists, from the imposing conqueror to your faithful companion Koros. This map contains amazing scenery, challenging enemies, and unique mechanics. It has more than 40 hours of gameplay that you can enjoy alone or with friends.

name: 100animalese
description: An action-adventure game where you work together with a total of 100 animals to escape from a mysterious facility.

name: Osomatsu-san Protagonist Contest Pokoball
description:
Iyami and the others have come to steal the hero's seat! Throw a bouncy ball and fight against it!

Just decide the angle to throw the ball and release it! Throw the ball and attack it!
If you throw it aiming at the gap between the wall and the enemy, you can hit continuously and deal a lot of damage!

Of course, familiar members such as Totoko, Dekapan, Chibita, Hatabo and Dayon,
Oil King, Kamimatsu, and that character and that character
In addition, that character and that character will also appear in total over 100 bodies!

name: 100 Line Christmas
description:
100 Line Christmas is a mini community project targeting Vanilla Doom 2 (complevel 2). The project is inspired by Arsinikk and NinjaDelphox's 100 Line Massacre.

As the 100 in the title suggests, each map was limited to 100 lines at most. Mappers were only given one week to make maps for the project.

The megawad comes with 30 maps (28 normal + 2 secret) from the Doomworld Community! All maps were designed with pistol start in mind, though continuous play is perfectly fine. Eachï»¿ map should take around 2-5 minutes to finish.

name: Another Shadow
description: Another Shadow is the sixth chapter in Hidden Town escape game series. You will have to interact between two characters in this mysterious point and click adventure. But remember, what you do in one world will affect the other, so make the right decisions.

name: 100 Animalease
description: An action-adventure game where you work together with a total of 100 animals to escape from a mysterious facility.

name: Dancing Pandas
description: Not a dancing game! A chill, relaxing Indie adventure game. Roam around different islands helping out the villagers and animals. Rescue the islands from catastrophes with different collected tools, trade resources for upgrades and solve simple mysteries.

name: Now You Are the Persecuted
description: You spawn in a dungeon that hasn't loaded yet and for some reason the other enemies (apart from you) want to attack you and you have to escape before they reach you (there could be many bugs).

name: Resttw
description: Restt is an addictive game, which will test how well can you handle your anger and stress. The game is in hand-made graphics with a retro touch. The whole game is inspired by Slovak streamer resttpowered.

name: Quadice
description: A Tile-Matching Puzzle Game

name: The Tarkiff Transfer Incident
description: Most realities don't mix. Explore what remains of Tarkiff, the city you once called home and uncover what happened.

name: Mini Golf & Pool Bundle
Darkest Wave
description: A mod with 3 maps.

name: Argol: Kronoss' Castle
description:
Platformer action game, mixing gothic and mythological atmospheres.

Argol: Kronoss' Castle is a platformer action game largely inspired by 90s hits. Between gothic universe and mythological legends, it is decorated as it deserves with a rich and epic soundtrack to make you live an adventure in the purest arcade style.

name: Die Känguru-Verschwörung
description: Achtung, Achtung! This retro platforming movie tie-in for "Die Känguru-Verschwörung" is only playable in German! Zis is not a drill!

name: Santa Claus: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade
description: A game in the "Breakthrough Gaming Arcade" series! This game's release is part of Breakthrough Gaming's "Bible Video Game Sundays"!

name: Zippy the Circle: Special
description: A game in the "Zippy the Circle" series! This game's release is part of Breakthrough Gaming's "Bible Video Game Sundays"!

name: Mega Man World 5 DX
description:
Mega Man V was released on 1994 for the original Game Boy. While the previous four entries in Nintendo’s handheld recycled some content from the NES games, the fifth and final entry finally got its unique story, original enemies and a bunch of exclusive features. And now… you can truly enjoy it in full color!

Just imagine, in the era of Game Boy Color, when Zelda, Tetris and many other games were re-released as the famous DX versions… How Mega Man could have looked if Capcom had made a DX version of this underrated gem? Now you can with this ambitious colorization project that took more than two years! And, not only that, but the hack also optimizes the game’s code, thus removing all slowdown from the original game! Pause menu has been reprogrammed as well, and added icons to every weapon (just like the later NES Mega Man games), making it looking gorgeous!

name: Nightmare of the Purge
description: The rules are simple! 2 teams with the same number of players the rule of the game is to kill each other and ambush the other team your team must have the most players compared to the other to win at the end of the time limit.

name: Xross Dreams
description: Head-to-head arcade VS game, where all the characters are puzzle games, you control 2 at a time, and everybody does their own damage. A pre-, mid-, and post-apocalyptic fairy tale that teaches you telepathy if you decipher it properly. An climactic journey through stars and minds and trust.

name: Nokta
description: Nokta is an online compatitive FPS game that aims to give players fun and unique experience.

name: Lorn's Lure: Danny's Song
description:
An assistant robot boots up to find their mission's researcher.

Just one of the stories in the Lorn's Lure Megastructure.

name: Raanaa: The Shaman Girl - The Windman's Land
description:
Raanaa is a third person adventure 3D platformer.
Raanaa, a courageous shaman girl, helps the spirit worlds that are in danger. With the help of her shaman abilities and her magical dress, she can defy gravity.

Raanaa travels through wondrous spirit realms and collaborates with different Gods and Goddesses to fight evil spirits and deities in order to obtain balance in the universe and save humanity.
Raanaa travels through spirit worlds that are all inspired by old Saami and Norse stories and mythology. In every episode the player gets to visit in a new spirit world. Become the savior of the spirit worlds!

JUMP, GLIDE AND SOAR TO EXPLORE!
Raanaa's shamanistic powers and magic dress allows her to jump higher & further, glide and even soar through the air! In the spirit worlds the islands, trees and even mountains are floating in the air, these skills become very handy!

SEEK, FIND AND COLLECT!
To proceed in the game, Raanaa has to activate the powerful Sieidi stones by collecting enough colourful spirit essence. But there are more things to be found in the spirit worlds. Hidden objects and animals, not to mention plenty of tokens! So many in fact that it raises a question: what will happen if you collect them all?

name: BloodBoarderz
description: Race to the finish line and satisfy your murderous wishes while you go down the bloody mountains dodging obstacles and slaying your enemies!

name: Where Winter Crows Go
description: Would you risk living together with a stranger in an isolated cabin to avoid the freezing cold?

name: Winter Fragments
description: Winter Fragments is a cute slice of life visual novel with light yuri undertones about a couple of best friends set in 2001. It’s a nostalgic, sentimental story about the joys of creating: particularly when it’s done with a dear friend.

name: Furious Bounce
description:
Furious Bounce is a competitive and dynamic online multiplayer hockey game.
Play unique characters, invite your friends and join online games of up to 4 players. Defend your goal while trying to score at your opponents. Improve your Bouncers and reach the top of the leaderboard.

name: Jolly Junkyard
description: Jolly Junkyard is a short Industrial/Post-Apocalyptic Christmas episode for Doom 2 designed for limit removing source ports made by various members of Doomer Boards for the holiday season.

name: The Goblin is Out
description: Continuing my tradition (??) of making a deranged kink Bitsy at Christmas time for the Bitsy Jam but then not actually submitting it to the jam. This time it has basically nothing to do with the jam theme.

name: Nimbus
description: Utilize our highly detailed flight system to control your gas expenditure, flap openings, and more :)

name: The Children's Friend
description: Sin descripción

name: Ninety-Six
description: A remade version of 96, with optimized performance, reworked maps and brand-new features. This version also contains the bonus episode Another Story and a secret folder to unlock at the end of the game.

name: Street's Disciple
description: A battle platform fighter for a single player versus 3 computer controlled characters. You play as a street disciple ninja and the ninjas are at war with each other. Punch and Kick and show that you're top ninja and can lead the group to be their new ninja master of Streets Disciple Ninja Edition.

name: Mind the Pipes!
description:
Equipped with a high-tech protective suit, the nameless hero of this 2d platforming game embarks on a dangerous journey to save his company from bankruptcy.

He must constantly utilize his suit's ability to change color, as he will be traversing several levels of pipes containing highly hazardous liquids that may instantly disintegrate him, if he makes one bad move. Of course, he is also in constant danger of falling down the depths of the unknown...

name: Hentai Christmas
description: Hentai Christmas is a relaxing puzzle game. With the theme of christmas and 24 unique sexy girls. Enjoy sexy girls pictures and relaxing music to complete the puzzle.

name: Cats Puzzle
description: This is a cat puzzle game for all ages. It's a fun game that will improve your reasoning and intellectual ability.

name: Truss
description: Developed for Haunted PS1's Madvent Calendar 3: Necrosis.

name: Mario Rescues Santa Claus
description: Bowser has stolen all of Santa's presents and even kidnapped him! Without Santa, nobody can deliver them!

name: Pretty Bird 9
description: Pretty is a young bird learning to fly. He is the last bird from the nest that can't fly yet. Help Pretty get over different obstacles and most importantly get the highest score you can!

name: Extreme Wrestling
description: Select 2 amongst 13 wrestlers to make up the best Wrestling team and find your path until you win the world championship belt. In addition to punches and kicks, you’ll be able to use 21 combos to make up the best Wrestling moves seen so far. Served by superb animations and a fantastic ambiance, highly playable with intuitive controls, Extreme Wrestling will allow you to play on 4 difficulty settings.

name: The Snowman Story
description: The snow has finally come, and you have the chance to build the snowmen, which you ever wanted. Go on and enjoy the snow!

name: Sawnic
description: Sawnic is a special Sonic with all sorts of new abilities, gameplay changes, quality of life tweaks, and even more!

name: Hituzibuster
description:
This is an invader mini-game.
Throw sheep to annihilate your enemies.
You have to collect the sheep you threw.
The game ends when you complete Round 30.

name: Quiz Thiz United Kingdom: Silver Edition
description: Answer questions about the United Kingdom and collect valuable points! Also, learn new facts about the United Kingdom while playing!

name: My Chameleon Girlfriend
description: My Chameleon Girlfriend is Galgame, an AVG visual novel. Pushy rich lady in love with me? Throw me a handbook of male morality? Super star only loves me? dream? In fact, the beautiful girl who loves me has a secret behind her... Do you choose to dote on rich women or female stars?

name: Groovy
description: Groovy is a fast-paced precision platformer where you can manipulate the colors of the world. Use your color powers to avoid traps, walk through walls, and launch through levels.

name: The Backrooms Lost Tape
description: You work in the cinema as an usher and accidentally fell into the Backrooms, now being trapped, needing to unravel the mysteries of the yellow rooms in order to get out of this place, but be careful, there are entities that will be in your way.

name: Repurpose
description:
You and several others have passed away.

Rather than being sent to Heaven or Hell, the powers that may be are unable to decide where you should go. You wake up in the Garden of Eden who's new home has been made in Limbo. You have three options: either take the trials to earn your place in Heaven, live it up in Hell, or remain lost in Limbo for eternity.

It's a lot to take in fresh off your death bed... but maybe you find each other's peace along the way.

name: Quest Together
description: Take up your sword and shield and go on a quest with your friends!

name: Temporal Deadzone
description: Explore a place of dreams, frozen in time. Created for the LSD Jam 2022.

name: Li'l Taffer
description: A procedurally generated stealth adventure! Developed in slightly more than 7 days for the 2022 7dfps and PROCJAM game jams.

name: Batman: Rogue City
description: Batman rogue city is a doom total conversion mod featuring the famous caped crusader as he works to take down his rogues gallery once again. The game controls similarly to doom eternal, using the zmovement mod as a base. Grapple up buildings, sneak up on thugs, and drive the batmobile in the best doom superhero experience to date.

name: Awesome Game
description: Four stories by children, turned into this chaotic and extremely awesome game! Made on commission for Kulturverket and Humlab Umeå.

name: Creature Creator
description: Create your own creatures to explore online worlds with friends and collect new parts to upgrade your stats and abilities! Complete quests, battle enemies, challenge friends to minigames, or just have fun roleplaying — the possibilities are endless when your imagination is the limit!

name: N Step Steve: Part 2
description: The massive conclusion to the N Step Steve saga.

name: Little Red Memories
description: Bonnie, a young woman struggling with traumatic memories of her past, begins to find herself in a strange, dangerous world that's set out to kill her no matter what. Will she be able to permanently escape this unfamiliar world and the horrors from her memories along the way? Or will she succumb to the darkness of The Parallel and meet her end?

name: Plants vs. Zombies 2: Odyssey
description: Sin descripción

name: Ciudad Anómala de Buenos Aires
description: Ciudad Anómala de Buenos Aires is an interactive narrative of strange but true stories that took place in the Autonomous City of Buenos Aires. It has several mini games, humor, and constant interaction with mysterious and ghostly characters. Moreover, it is riddled with references to Argentine culture (from Borges to Cha Cha Cha) and the video games that shaped us.

name: Girls Frantic Clan
description: Sin descripción

name: Midnight Tales Vol.3: Christmas
description: In the middle of Christmas, a man tells some horror stories to his daughter... but something is very wrong...

name: Deck Defenders
description: Deck Defenders is an online card game where players can battle it out to become the top-ranked player. Collect cards and build your own decks to customize your strategy. Your forces need your strategies and tactics in this competitive card battler where the superior player always comes out on top!

name: The Visitor
description: In 'The Visitor' you will play as an author named Rachel. Your goal is to complete your book chapter by chapter before the deadline that is coming up. The longer you sit and type, the more you will slip into a schizophrenia state of mind. Complete the chapters and return to a normal average life!

name: Wizard's Wheel 2
description: An idle and incremental rpg, inspired by retro, turned based role playing games, Wizard's Wheel 2 comes packed with heroes to collect, loot to acquire, equipment to upgrade, and a ton of ways to progress. Recruit, equip, upgrade, and spin the Wizard's Wheel in this deep, retro idle RPG.

name: Survival Shot
description: Survival Shot designed for VR, Zombie apocalypse set for lone survivors. Uncover a sinister plan that takes survivors through Bridge/Town survival & Zombie Run. Be ready to cast undead into hell. Armed weapons with real-life movements to explore a post apocalyptic world in VR.

name: Christmas Luge
description: The penguins in the villages below need some Christmas cheer! Slide your way down the snowy mountains, gathering scarves along the way, and toss them to penguins in need.

name: Torecower
description: Torecower is an arcade wave-based minimalist game where you build automatic turrets to shoot enemies. Each turret has an unique attack behaviour. After finishing a wave, you can get an upgrade on the skill tree. Choose wisely to make your turrets stronger.

name: Mystery Trackers: Fall of Iron Rock - Collector's Edition
description: You’ve been sent to Iron Rock to find your long-lost colleague. But your trip quickly takes a turn for the bizarre when you find the town patrolled by the new Mayor’s robots, trapping the residents inside! Do you have what it takes to help them and escape before it’s too late?

name: A Test Before Jianghu
description: It's a story about the mountains before we came to Jianghu You can play a boy or a girl, figure out your identity, collect G's, and win the test

name: Backrooms Mainframe
description: Backrooms Mainframe is a 1-6 player co-op horror game. Explore the labyrinthes while avoiding entities and other dangers while finding your way through.

name: The Night Before Star Wars
description: To Save Spacemas, you must fly across the planet and collect all the neccesary components, while shootering the empire along the way!

name: Burninate the Barnyard
description: Help Trogdor barninate the farmtryside in this fabulous reskin!

name: Tiny Lands: Expansion Pack 1
description: An expansion pack to the main game, Tiny Lands. This pack adds an additional 30 levels focused on three themes: Cozy Xmas, Desert Mysteries, and City Life.

name: Merge Your Room: Extended Edition
description:
After a day of fun and games with friends and family, it's time to clean it all up! Find pairs of items scattered around the apartment and merge them, putting them in their places. Every day there are more toys, so finding them becomes even more difficult! Will you manage to collect more of them than your friends?

Includes Toys Pack.

name: Sweet Bakery Tycoon: Premium Edition
description: Start your baking career and prepare some delicious cakes for your clients, using a whole set of creams, fruits, and decorations.

name: Merge Your Room: Toys Pack
description: "Toys Pack" is a collection of additional 50 levels for the game along with new toys that extend the fun time in the game.

name: Classic Games Collection Vol.1+2 Bundle
description: All the classic games you love in one place!

name: Truck Simulator 3
description: Truck Simulator 3 is a game that presents a unique driving challenge! Can you efficiently drive a vehicle that at first glance seems impossible to control?

name: Roller Katz: BF - Episode 1
description:
Skate, jump, shoot and destroy!
Welcome to Clean City, a futuristic city that lives under the threat of Sergeant Rocco.

name: Neko Loop
description: A cat girl facing a multitude of enemies, bosses, secrets and challenges creates the cutest roguelike game you've ever seen.

name: Shooting Gallery
description: Aim for the middle and test your mettle against a volley of diabolical ducks, tricky targets, and bewitched bombs as they tauntingly float across your playdate screen.

name: NOX: Chapter 1
description: NOX: Chapter 1 is a first-person puzzle game, where the player has to make use of gravity changes, gravity shifts and portals to explore the dreams and nightmares of a child. All this, in a world inspired by the work of Escher.

name: Repugnant Bounty
description: Rosemarie, an alien princess from the planet Nimola seeks genocide on the evil monsters who killed her mother and people.

name: Tonari ni Kanojo no Iru Shiawase: In First Snow With Her
description:
Summer vacation is over, and September approaches autumn.
Literary club on the verge of abolishment. I, who is the manager of the club, and my junior member Tomoya Serizawa.

name: Cubic Light
description: Cubic Light is minimalistic puzzle game where you need to put blocks to activate the entire image. Grab the block, define the color if necessary, and put it into the correct place. You need to activate all the cells to complete the level.

name: Raiden: 30th Anniversary
description:
Raiden IV x Mikado remix
Raiden IV, the popular shoot ’em up arcade and console game, debuts on Nintendo Switch with remixed BGM by a superb lineup of artists produced by Game Center Mikado.
Instill fear in your enemies with devastating attacks and earn the acclaimed title of Master Ace!

Raiden V: Director's Cut
Arcade hit Raiden first left its mark on the shooting genre 25 years ago. The easy-to-learn, hard-to-master series comes to the Nintendo Switch in its most modern and advanced form yet! Join the war for Earth’s future-where the tide of battle holds constant surprises.

name: Lucy's World
description: Lucy's World is a cute 2D Jump & Run game where your task is to search the worlds and free little dragons.

name: Fargone
description: Fargone is an RPG-based survival game with a strong focus on creating a living, breathing world through dynamic events, and NPC interactions. Set in a fictional land known only as The Barrens, you must survive by any means, whether that be alone or by allying yourself with a faction.

name: Recoil vs. The World
description: Use the recoil of your guns to make it to get to the end of these saw blade-filled labyrinths! Turn lasers off, switch guns mid-level, and much more throughout 3 different biomes, each with their own new obstacles and levels to make a fun but rage-inducing experience!

name: Fallen Arena
description: This is a leisure competitive game, fighting for crystals in the arena, getting bigger, defeating opponents. New heroes, new skills and new weapons, call your friends to fight together~

name: Didactic Jesus Game
description: An ideal game to read the Gospel in an original and fun way. You will play the role of Jesus to save the world from evil, and you will learn how much he loves you. Are you ready to know his path full of Truth and Life?

name: Battle Axe: Special Edition
description: Battle Axe is an arcade top-down hack & slash featuring high-quality visuals created by veteran pixel artist Henk Nieborg, true to form game mechanics, and music from the legendary VGM composer Manami Matsumae – retro gamers rejoice!

name: Chicken Hero in Wulin
description: All Creatures will be uphold justice and "chivalrous".In the familiar world of martial arts,I regenerate a chicken.As a chicken, can you change your life against the weather and create miracles!Become an unprecedented and fantastic Great Xia! Everything is about to start!

name: City Metro Simulator
description: In this simulator you will act as a metro driver driving above the city. T

name: Asuka-san ha Nabikanai
description: Asuka-san wa Nabikanai is a visual novel developed by Azarashi Software about a student council president.

name: Roaming the Stars
description: A sandbox, space-exploration survival game where you can build bases and explore other planets and moons around the star Craterous.

name: Beyond the Edge of Owlsgard
description: Save a peaceful world from being annihilated by machines in this oldschool point&click tale, inspired by classic animated movies and adventure games of the 90s.

name: The Story of the Flood
description: An interactive visual novel about flood. In this game, every choice can lead to different endings.

name: Input6
description: INPUT6 is a short, fast-paced horror game. Search through the abandoned robot factory avoiding eye contact with malfunctioning robot by instantly switching between playing in separate sections of the factory. Figure out what led to the company's collapse. Be quick! You don’t have much time.

name: Simuliator Pryghaniia Po Garazham
description: Прыгайте по гаражам, курите сижки, пейтке певко - всё в этом шедевре.

name: Sports Story
description: Sports story is a game about sports, but not always. Various non-sporting pursuits provide variety. Alternate activities like dungeon exploration, stealthy infiltrations and fishing expeditions mean something unexpected waits around every corner. Sometimes it is even sports.

name: Soccer World
description: Master your goalkeeping skills with Soccer World—your ultimate training tool! Whether you're aiming to improve or complement your outdoor practice, our immersive VR game brings pro-level training right to your headset.

name: A Little to the Left: Good Tidyings
description: A Little to the Left’s Daily Tidy Delivery gets a wintry wrapping

name: Leonor & Raúl: Christmas
description: Sin descripción

name: Invasion of the Geminorons
description: Sin descripción

name: The Deal
description: The Deal is a total conversion single player mission mod for Call of Duty 4 which is heavily inspired from the 007 James Bond movies along with other video games and movies. The mission revolves around a secret meeting that takes place in middle of London on which the MI6 is spying upon.

name: Valis: The Fantasm Soldier
description:
Yuko Aso was an ordinary high school girl, but now she begins her journey as the new Warrior of Valis. Her duty is to defeat Rogles, the evil ruler of Vecanti and his 4 Vogue generals and retrieve the five shards of the Fantasm Jewel. The legend of the Warrior of Valis begins here.

From gameplay to visuals and sound, everything about this new “origin of Valis” is powered up from its original release.

name: Valis: The Fantasm Soldier
description:
Yuko Aso was once an ordinary high school girl. One fateful day, her destiny was forever changed when she was chosen by Valia, the queen of the Dreamland, to be the next Warrior of Valis. Meanwhile Rogles, the Dark King of Vecenti, began his cross-dimensional assault with his powerful Vogue generals at his command.

The MSX version contains only 5 stages due to space limitations, and while the story is not very deep since there are no animated cutscenes, the characters have good movement and it stands on its own as a pure side-scrolling action game that can be enjoyed even today.

name: Valis IV
description:
The evil king Galgear and his generals have been resurrected after being sealed away for thousands of years and immediately begin their conquest of the human world and the Dreamland, currently ruled by Queen Valna.

With the Warrior of Valis Yuko now in the Heavens and unable to return to the other worlds, there is no one left to stand against Galgear. This is where the new protagonist Lena makes her appearance.

Just like in Valis III before it, players can swap between 3 playable characters at any time. With increased difficulty compared to the previous entries in the series, players have more ways than ever to enjoy clearing stages. The visuals in Valis IV, which includes animated cutscenes with Japanese voice acting that are an absolute must-see, are the best in the series.

name: Sicko Sanctum: Megahecks
description: An infinite, wave-based, movement shooter that takes place in a surreal code hell. Your objective: get revenge and go beyond. With the use of unlimited upgrades, it looks easy on the surface. But with harder-than-ever enemies, special stages, and now a final boss, it's a tough time!

name: Takamori Puzzle
description: A puzzle-story fan game about Calli & Kiara from Hololive.

name: Hearts War
description: Job Change RPG that you can enjoy to your liking! Today, I'm a wizard! Tomorrow, I'll be a thief! MMORPG is also N jobs! We will introduce you to a new world that is different from MMORPG.

name: Witch's Garden
description: Falling in love, the world begins to change.

name: Flipz
description: Flipz is a game where you collect small pieces of your favorite characters and cartoons and battle with other players to get the best and rarest ones.

name: Syd of Valis
description: Wait a minute! When did Valis become so cutesy?!

name: The Runic Conjecture
description: The Runic Conjecture is a magical puzzle game about experimenting and learning the meaning of mysterious runes. What may seem like Magic now is merely a Science that you have yet to understand.

name: My Home Design: Makeover Games
description: Sin descripción

name: Forbidden Trip
description: A Total Conversion for Amnesia: TDD. A parallel space & time, your story. No memories of last night. Strange. Being a little paranoid, you junkie? Reconsider your bad habits someday… for now, recover crucial documents before leaving the country tomorrow. Be quick, don't think. Easy.

name: A Shaman's Ballard
description: Explore the mysterious world of Erenblad to protect the land from demonic entities and perform your shanar to become the new master shaman of Aahkray in this tactical turn-based RPG.

name: Fears of Glasses o-o World War
description: In this game you have to overcome your fears in the war. Explosions, shots, weapons. Everything that you are afraid of, you will find in this game.

name: The Hidden Object Guru
description: The Hidden Object Guru - Find the Hidden Plushies in some of Your favorite Steam games from Archor Games and HO Guru Games !

name: Call of the Abyss
description: Call of the Abyss is a rogue-like card game inspired by anime such as Made in Abyss. You have a long way to go, descending into the abyss. Explore the depths of this world, defeat mysterious enemies and find unexplainable things.

name: Simple Rally
description: A Casual Rally Game.

name: Space Runaway
description: Space Runaway, a compelling intergalactic journey soaked in bullet hell. Enemy vessels, lasers and larger than life bosses coming at you full speed in a 16-bit authentic arcade experience like no other. It was created as an arcade mini-game within Wanted: Dead.

name: Turret Girl
description: Turret Girl is a romantic visual novel about her struggles to find love and acceptance in a hostile world, with a Match3 Jewels mini-game to break up the action.

name: One Tap Golf VR
description: ONE TAP GOLF VR brings a fresh new experience to your headset with sixty levels divided into stages of three for you to enjoy ! Every stage you play , you will have three hearts to survive three levels. If you miss three times, you go back to the beginning of the stage !

name: Meongnyang Animal Hospital Companion Animal Health Guardian!
description:
Players start their shift at a veterinary hospital that specializes in treating dogs and cats. There, along with the friendly director and senior veterinarians with personality, they help animal friends who visit the hospital every day.

Let's find a painful spot in "examination mode" where you can feel "feel like a veterinarian"! You can take a closer look at or touch the bodies of your animal friends, and use medical devices such as stethoscopes, thermometers, and X-rays to find out where they are sick based on comments from guardians or advice from seniors.

If the examination is over, treat yourself with 20 mini-games! After finding the sore spot, treat it in the form of a mini-game. The tension of having to treat your animal friends skillfully so that they don't feel uncomfortable and the sense of accomplishment when you treat them nicely are the charms of the mini game in this title.

Take plenty of rest on your days off! Let's experience a slightly grown-up holiday!
On days off, you can enjoy shopping in the city, change your hair at a beauty salon, or relax at a cafe to experience an “adult-like holiday”!

name: BattleReign
description: “This is a Free to play Third Person Shooter Game Set for Henna to challenge and Liberate Nexirus. It is designed to create a challenge between role playing weapons and Sci-fi weapons. Dive into Henna's world and set yourself on a deliverance quest.”

name: Ever Legion
description: Sin descripción

name: Harvest Yuuka
description: A peaceful agriculture slow life simulator game. The game purpose is to make your own wonderful garden. You are free to turn this large vacant lot into a flower garden or a colorful seasonal orchard.

name: Hot Steam
description: Loving Conversations in Shared Spaces

name: QUByte Classics: The Tale of Clouds and Wind
description: The Tale of Cloud and Wind (QUByte Classics) is a beat’em up game with lots of action and hours of gameplay. Choose between 3 outlaw heroes and help them battle through oppressing armies of evil men.

name: Words in Word
description:
Words in Word is a word collecting game familiar to many since childhood. Have intellectual fun and make words from over 1000 word puzzles.
In addition, in a special mode you will compete with computer opponents.

name: Zombie Survival
description: The zombie apocalypse has arrived and you will have to keep everyone alive. Discover the terrifying story of these 4 characters.

name: Risk your life to get your dinner back Nyanzou action game
description:
Maximum speed is infinite
Jump action full of sprinting

name: Farming Simulator 22 - Year 2 Season Pass
description:
New crops, new types of machines, new brand partners, and a lot of other cool things are coming to Farming Simulator 22 over the course of 2023.

As Farming Simulator 22 is all about growing your business into an agricultural empire, the sophomore season of new content additions will further expand our biggest game to date with even more content for you to enjoy.

Here’s what you get: The Year 2 Season Pass grants you access to four official packs as well as an expansion developed by GIANTS Software as listed below. Packs and expansion are estimated to be released between early 2023 and late 2023.

- GÖWEIL Pack: March 21, 2023
- Hay & Forage Pack: June 13, 2023
- Pack 3: Mid-2023
- Pack 4: Late 2023
- Big Expansion: Late 2023
- Bonus: BM-Volvo LM 845

name: Space Engineers: Ultimate Edition 2022
description: The Space Engineers Ultimate Edition 2022 includes all of the DLCs for Space Engineers, all the decorative blocks and cosmetic items released in 2019, 2020, 2021 and 2022.

name: My Goddess Girlfriend
description:
You’ve always believed the apocalypse to be nothing more than a fairytale, a story designed to scare people into being good… but that all changes when the Destroyer of Worlds comes crashing through your kitchen! Thankfully for you and all humanity, she smacks her head on a table and loses her memory.

With the help of a mysterious agent and your childhood friend, you decide to try and show this fallen angel how good humanity really is so that when she gets her memories back, perhaps she’ll reconsider humanity’s fate. It all seems straightforward until the angel starts getting comfortable with human culture and wants to explore romance…

name: Hyper Rosalina Kart Wii & Rosalina 2 Turbo
description: Hyper Rosalina Kart Wii & Rosalina 2 Turbo is a custom character and custom track distribution created by Scuder1aSc0tti. It mainly contains retro tracks and custom tracks from other games. In addition to that, most characters are replaced by a form of Rosalina.

name: Babbdi
description: Find your way out of Babbdi. A short, first person exploration experience.

name: Love in Login
description: Met the girl who is my game buddy in real life.

name: Valkyrie Profile: Lenneth
description: An intricate and evocative tale of fates woven by gods and mortals, steeped in Norse mythology, punctuated by groundbreaking combat, and brought to life by a soundtrack considered among gaming's greatest. New features such as rewind function, quick save and load, visual presets, etc have been added.

name: Emoji Kart Racer
description:
Get behind the wheel with up to four players and race across 16 intense racetracks. The unique emoji generator also gives you the opportunity to create your own personal emoji racer from thousands of combinations.

Let yourself be inspired by the colorful tracks with great music, funny sound effects and of course countless emoji's. Great emoji power-ups
like poop or rocket are also available!

name: Trivia Live
description:
Trivia-Live is a multi-player trivia game that lets you play head to head trivia against family and friends using your smartphone or tablet (iOS and Android).
Trivia-live is social gaming at it's very best in an easy, out of the box, pick-up-and-play trivia game that will keep everyone at the edge of their seat.
Jam packed with over 5,000 multiple choice questions in five categories, no game will be the same.

name: Arcade Archives: Metal Hawk
description:
"Metal Hawk" is a shooting game released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.) in 1988.
Earn points by operating your aircraft while changing its altitude and destroying the targets displayed on the radar within the time limit.
Search for enemies at a high altitude, and if you find an enemy or enemy base, descend to range and destroy them.

name: A Maiden Astrologer Divines the Future
description: This work is an adventure game that you can enjoy about an astrologer named Izumi who feels happy and rewarded when "making someone happy" or "being able to support someone".

name: DragonHill VR
description: This is an action-adventure game built for virtual reality. You play as an adventurer, freely roam and explore in a medieval open world. Complete a series of quests to unlock skills and upgrade equipment, and finally defeat the dragon in the hill cave.

name: Gizoku Tantei Nosuri
description: Gizoku Tantei Nosuri is a visual novel developed and published by Aquaplus. A spin-off of the Utawarerumono series, the game stars Nosuri and a reluctant Haku as they investigate evils threatening the Imperial Capital of Yamato.

name: Majestic Majolical
description: Nintendo Switch port that combines all three PC volumes & adds in a route for Jasper Beryl.

name: Drone Race Simulator Pilot Flight School Airplane Games Jet 2023
description: Realistic and hardcore drone simulator will give you emotions and control experience. In the game you will be able to improve your skills in aerobatics, which you have to show by passing difficult routes for a limited time, which is becoming more and mor…

name: The Sentient Box
description: Investigate the life of John Doe as he resides in his lost memories in this story-driven Alternate Reality Game (ARG) that merges Your Real Life with science fiction as it explores the Dark Limits of Alternate History and The SCP Foundation.

name: Wrestling Manager 2023
description: Do you have what it takes to bring your Wrestling Company to the top!? Wrestling Manager 2023 is an easy-to-use game where you manage a wrestling company, and bring it to the mountain top!

name: Money Parasite: Usotsuki na Onna
description: An otome game by Takuyo.

name: Uta no Prince-sama: All Star After Secret for Nintendo Switch
description: A port for Nintendo Switch.

name: Windstorm: An Unexpected Arrival
description: After surviving a fire, Windstorm is restless and not even Mika is able to help him. It is only when the brave girl Ari unexpectedly arrives at the beautiful Kaltenbach estate that Windstorm is able to calm down by befriending Ari. Even though Ari has …

name: Earth Defense Force 4.1 for Nintendo Switch
description: This is the sequel to "Earth Defense Force 3".

name: Fitness Boxing Fist of the North Star
description:
For resolving lack of daily exercise and strengthening your physical strength!

You can enjoy authentic exercise in the world of "Fist of the North Star" without changing the functions of "Fitness Boxing"!

name: Grappling Dash
description: Jump, Swing, Dash Grappling Dash is fast-pace, uniquely stylized platformer game. Use your grappling hook to swing around in giant levels, dash through energy crystals, find hidden secrets and master even the most difficult worlds. It’s easy to play, it’s fast and it’s fun.

name: Hyper Gunsport
description: An arcade action game about shooting a ball into a goal. It's cyberpunk volleyball with guns.

name: Eternal
description: Eternal is a stylized combat action RPG, where you fight your way through a fantasy landscape using a variety of weapons, shields, consumables and spells

name: The Most Boring Life Ever 2: Work From Home
description: Do you miss life pre covid? The fantastic yet boring 9-5 of our existence? Then this is NOT the game for you. This boring game involves you clicking your way through the day during quarantine as you go by living life with covid in this endless experience.

name: Runner Party
description: A competitive multiplayer running game with up to 4 players (either via LAN or online). Use traps and projectiles in order to make life difficult for your competitors. Slow down the enemy to get ahead and be careful getting hit or you risk losing the race!

name: OverDrift Festival
description: Become the star on festival of car culture and sports. Drift, sprint and circuit racing. Huge game world, iconic tracks. Unique collection of cars. Wide range of tuning and styling options. Accurate physics: a sense of speed and lateral g-forces.

name: Twisted Christmas Jam 2022
description: 13 varied (some rather large) maps + custom start map. This year, there was no 1024^3 space constraint, and jammers used a mix of Halloween and Christmas themes since there was no Halloween jam.

name: Chase Chase Jokers
description: Chase Chase Jokers is a video game developed by Konami and released on arcade platforms on December 21, 2022 in Japan.

name: Microgames Jam Pack
description:
This is the end result of the Gameboy Microgames Jam held in November of 2022. The goal of the jam was to have everyone work on WarioWare-style microgames that would then be combined together into a single game.

Microgames Jam Pak is that game.

name: Dr. Robotnik's Mean Bean Tetris
description: Dr. Robotnik's Mean Bean Tetris is a fan game where, after causing a dimensional rift and giving rise to an evil double of himself, the Badniks hold an enigmatic "Mean Bean Tetris" contest. Only the original Dr. Robotnik, with his cunning and skills, will be able to prove that he is the real one.
